《Xexex》是一款水平捲軸射擊遊戲，玩家駕駛一艘名為“燧發槍”的飛船，必須從邪惡領主克勞斯手中拯救 E-Square 星球上的藍髮公主艾琳。

玩家的飛船有一個可拆卸的球體附件，稱為燧石，其行為方式與 Irem 的“R-Type”系列中的“原力裝置”類似。可以獲得能量提升來增加燧石的力量、移動速度、改變主要武器，甚至給玩家額外的生命。

玩家開始遊戲時配備了質子激光器，它會發射細弱的子彈流。擊敗某些敵人會掉落其他武器：
歸位激光器：一種 3 路激光器，具有針對頂部和底部激光器的弱“彎曲”歸位功能。
暗影激光：當飛船上下移動時，激光束會產生造成傷害的陰影。
圓形激光：不尋常的分散射擊（與海外版本的主武器不同）
螺旋激光器：具有相當寬度的螺旋激光器。
搜索激光：具有強尋的能力的激光，沿方形軌跡傳播。
地面激光：發射升級版質子激光以及沿地面傳播的激光束。

當前武器的名稱顯示在屏幕底部。在非日本海外版本中，唯一可用的武器是質子激光，拾取能量只會增加武器的傳播範圍。導彈是次要武器。

mystwaru.name: 神秘戰士
mystwaru.original_desc:
Mystic Warriors is a horizontally-scrolling platform beat-em-up for up to four players, in which the evil 'SKULL' organisation has taken over the world and driven its terrified civilians into hiding. Five Ninja warriors set about destroying SKULL and freeing the World from its grip.

Mystic Warriors features five selectable characters, one of which is shown being kidnapped by SKULL once players have made their character choices. What follows is eight levels of platform 'run-and-gun' action, with an end-of-level boss waiting at the end of each stage.

Players are armed with both Shuriken throwing stars and with a sword for close encounters. Numerous boxes are scattered throughout the levels (or are being carried by enemies), all of which contain bonus items such as weapon power-ups or energy-replenishing food. Other power-ups include an invulnerability shield (known as the "Shinobi Shield") which lasts a few seconds and a "Smart Bomb" power-up, which destroys all on-screen enemies. Some boxes also contain points-giving items, such as bags of money, jewellery and gold.
mystwaru.desc:
《Mystic Warriors》是一款水平捲軸平台格鬥遊戲，最多可容納 4 名玩家，其中邪惡的“骷髏”組織已經佔領了世界，並迫使受驚的平民躲藏起來。五名忍者武士著手摧毀骷髏頭並將世界從其控制中解放出來。

《神秘勇士》有五個可選角色，一旦玩家做出角色選擇，其中一個就會被骷髏綁架。接下來是八個關卡的平台“跑轟”動作，每個關卡的末尾都會有一個關卡結束的 Boss。

玩家裝備有手裡劍飛鏢和劍以應對近距離遭遇戰。許多盒子散佈在各個關卡中（或由敵人攜帶），所有盒子都包含獎勵物品，例如武器強化或補充能量的食物。其他能力提升包括持續幾秒鐘的刀槍不入的護盾（稱為“忍盾”）和摧毀屏幕上所有敵人的“智能炸彈”能力提升。有些盒子還裝有積分物品，例如一袋袋錢、珠寶和黃金。

guwange.name: 古萬格
guwange.original_desc: The story of Guwange is set during the Muromachi period of Japan. During this time, increasing numbers of people suffer possession by shikigami. Although the shikigami grant great spiritual powers, the strain inflicted on the host causes them to die exactly one year after possession. However, a legend has sprung up regarding Guwange, the malevolent god trapped in Mt. Gokumon (i.e. Hell Gate). If one possessed by a shikigami can gather talismans of the five Chinese elements?wood, fire, earth, metal, water?from five demons serving Guwange, then infiltrate Gokumon and slay Guwange, the shikigami will be destroyed and the one possessed will not suffer a premature death.
guwange.desc: 古萬歌的故事發生在日本室町時代。這段時間，被式神附身的人越來越多。雖然式神賦予了強大的精神力量，但對宿主造成的壓力導致他們在擁有後一年內死亡。然而，關於被困在悟空山（即地獄之門）的惡神古萬蓋（Guwange）的傳說卻不斷湧現。如果式神附身者能從侍奉古萬閣的五魔身上收集到木、火、土、金、水五行符，然後潛入悟空，殺掉古萬閣，式神就會被消滅，附身者也不會英年早逝。

hattrick.name: 帽子戲法
hattrick.desc: 一場架空的 2 對 2 曲棍球比賽。

dw.name: 王朝戰爭
dw.original_desc: This game is a side-scrolling beat-em-up based on Japanese manga books of the same name and is a re-enactment of the historical battles between the Kingdom of Shu and the Yellow Turban rebels. Up to two players assume the roles of one of the four Chinese generals riding on horseback whose goal is to wipe out the 'Huang Ching', the organization responsible for the unrest of the Han Dynasty, and to eventually defeat the tyrant, Dong Zhuo.
dw.desc: 該遊戲是一款根據日本同名漫畫改編的橫向捲軸格鬥遊戲，再現了蜀國與黃巾起義軍之間的歷史戰鬥。最多兩名玩家扮演四名騎在馬背上的中國將軍之一，其目標是消滅造成漢朝動亂的組織“黃精”，並最終擊敗暴君董卓。

nitrobal.name: 硝基球
nitrobal.original_desc: Futuristic, fast and furious vertical action game, it's a sort of "Smash T.V." in a pinball environment.
nitrobal.desc: 未來派、快速而激烈的垂直動作遊戲，有點像“Smash T.V.”。在彈球環境中。

viostorm.name: 暴力風暴
viostorm.original_desc:
Violent Storm is a sideways-scrolling beat-em-up for up to three players set in the aftermath of World War III. The survivors of the war are attempting to rebuild their world but are being terrorised by violent gangs . Three vigilante heroes called 'Boris', 'Wade' and 'Kyle' are trying to protect the citizens but are hampered in their efforts by the evil and corrupt 'GELD' gang. As the heroes are patrolling the streets, they see their friend, Sheena, kidnapped by the gang. The vigilantes must fight through seven enemy-packed stages to rescue their friend and destroy the gang.

As well as the standard punch and kick moves, each character also has a special attack. This move is powerful enough to fell several enemies at once, but with the trade-off that each time a special attack is executed, some of the player's health is lost. Health levels can be replenished by finding the food that lies hidden in breakable crates and barrels. 

Some of the gang members will drop a weapon when they are felled. These weapons can then be picked up and used by the players. Destructible crates and barrels also contain weapons and random bonus items. Stunned enemies fall to the ground and can still be attacked while prone.
viostorm.desc:
《暴力風暴》是一款橫向捲軸格鬥遊戲，最多可容納三名玩家，背景設定在第三次世界大戰後。戰爭的倖存者正試圖重建他們的世界，但卻受到暴力團伙的恐嚇。名為“鮑里斯”、“韋德”和“凱爾”的三名義務警員英雄試圖保護公民，但他們的努力受到邪惡和腐敗的“GELD”團伙的阻礙。當英雄們在街上巡邏時，他們看到他們的朋友希娜被幫派綁架了。義務警員必須通過七個充滿敵人的關卡，拯救他們的朋友並摧毀該團伙。

除了標準的拳打腳踢動作外，每個角色還有特殊的攻擊方式。這一招的威力足以一次擊倒多個敵人，但每次執行特殊攻擊時都會損失一些玩家的生命值。找到隱藏在易碎板條箱和桶中的食物可以補充健康水平。

一些幫派成員被擊倒時會掉落武器。然後玩家可以拿起並使用這些武器。可破壞的板條箱和桶還包含武器和隨機獎勵物品。被擊暈的敵人會倒在地上，但在俯臥時仍然可以受到攻擊。

tokiu.name: 當然
tokiu.original_desc: Toki features elements of tongue-in-cheek humor combined with the action. The player takes control of an enchanted ape who must battle hordes of jungle monsters with energy balls from his mouth (described humorously as "monkey-spit" or "monkey-vomit" by some gamers). The ultimate goal is to destroy the evil wizard who cast a spell on you; therefore transforming yourself from an ape back into a human, and rescuing the kidnapped princess. The game was ported to several video game consoles and home computers.
tokiu.desc: Toki 的特點是半開玩笑的幽默元素與動作相結合。玩家控制一隻被施了魔法的猿猴，它必須用嘴裡的能量球與成群的叢林怪物戰鬥（一些玩家幽默地將其描述為“猴子吐口水”或“猴子嘔吐物”）。最終目標是消滅對你施咒的邪惡巫師；因此，你將自己從猿變回人類，並營救被綁架的公主。該遊戲被移植到多個視頻遊戲機和家用電腦上。

baddudes.name: 壞傢伙 vs. 龍忍者
baddudes.original_desc:
The game starts in New York City, where President Ronnie has been kidnapped by the nefarious DragonNinja. The game's intro begins with the following introduction: "Rampant ninja related crimes these days... Whitehouse is not the exception...". As soon as that occurs, a Secret Service agent asks two street-smart brawlers, named Blade and Striker: "President Ronnie has been kidnapped by the ninjas. Are you a bad enough dude to rescue Ronnie?". 

After hearing that, the Bad Dudes pursue the DragonNinja through the city streets, highway, sewers, transport train, forest, cave and into the secret ninja base in order to save President Ronnie.
baddudes.desc:
遊戲開始於紐約市，總統羅尼被邪惡的龍忍者綁架。遊戲的介紹以以下介紹開始：“這些天與忍者相關的犯罪猖獗......懷特豪斯也不例外......”。一旦發生這種情況，一名特勤局特工就問兩個街頭聰明的鬥毆者，名叫刀鋒和前鋒：“羅尼總統被忍者綁架了。你們是一個足夠壞的傢伙來拯救羅尼嗎？”。

壞傢伙們聞訊後，追趕龍忍者，穿過城市街道、高速公路、下水道、運輸列車、森林、洞穴，進入秘密忍者基地，以拯救羅尼總統。

smashtv.name: 粉碎電視
smashtv.original_desc:
Smash TV is a single-screen shoot-em-up for one or two players and is set in a futuristic game show in the year 1999. Contestants must enter enclosed arenas and compete to collect prizes, money and keys, while fighting to stay alive as they are attacked on all sides by waves of enemies.
The game is a sequel to the legendary "Robotron: 2084" and like its prequel, utilises a dual joystick control system, with the left stick controlling player movement and the right controlling the direction of fire.
Enemy waves enter each arena from four directions via open doorways and all must be killed before players can progress to the next stage. Some arenas feature static gun emplacements set into a wall that must also be destroyed. Power-ups that improve weapons, speed and armour appear at regular intervals, although each only lasts for a limited time.
Smash TV is broken down into stages, each with a set number of arenas. Tough end-of-level bosses await at the end of each stage.
smashtv.desc:
Smash TV 是一款適合一到兩名玩家的單屏射擊遊戲，背景設定在 1999 年的未來游戲節目中。參賽者必須進入封閉的競技場並競爭以收集獎品、金錢和鑰匙，同時在遭到一波又一波的敵人攻擊時為生存而戰。
該遊戲是傳奇遊戲《Robotron：2084》的續作，與前傳一樣，採用雙操縱桿控制系統，左搖桿控制玩家移動，右搖桿控制射擊方向。
一波又一波的敵軍通過敞開的大門從四個方向進入每個競技場，玩家必須將其全部消滅才能進入下一階段。一些競技場的特點是在牆上設置了靜態砲位，這些砲位也必須被摧毀。提高武器、速度和裝甲的能量提升會定期出現，儘管每個能量提升的持續時間有限。
Smash TV 分為多個階段，每個階段都有一定數量的競技場。每個階段結束時都會有艱難的末日頭目等待著您。

rthunder.name: 雷霆滾滾
rthunder.original_desc: Rolling Thunder is a single-player scrolling platform shoot-em-up in which a James Bond-esque secret agent codenamed 'Albatross' has been ordered by the Rolling Thunder anti-espionage unit to stop the criminal organization known as Geldra. Albatross must also rescue captured field agent, Lelia Blitz and overthrow Geldra's leader, Maboo.
rthunder.desc: 《Rolling Thunder》是一款單人滾動平台射擊遊戲，其中代號為“Albatross”的詹姆斯·邦德式特工受 Rolling Thunder 反間諜部門的命令，阻止名為 Geldra 的犯罪組織。信天翁還必須營救被俘的外勤特工萊莉亞·布利茨，並推翻格爾德拉的領袖馬布。

timeplt.name: 時間飛行員
timeplt.original_desc: Time Pilot is a multi-directionally scrolling shoot-em-up in which the player controls a futuristic jet fighter and takes on the role of pilot trying to rescue fellow pilots who are trapped in different time eras. The game consists of five different stages of play, each of which is set in a different time period.
timeplt.desc: 《Time Pilot》是一款多向捲軸射擊遊戲，玩家控制一架未來派噴氣式戰鬥機，並扮演飛行員的角色，試圖營救被困在不同時間時代的飛行員同伴。遊戲由五個不同的遊戲階段組成，每個階段都設置在不同的時間段。

fantzone.name: 最終幻想XV
fantzone.original_desc: The Fantasy Zone is under attack by an army of ruthless, yet undeniably cute, alien enemies. A fearless space fighter by the name of 'Opa-opa' (a craft that is as cute as the game's enemies, featuring wings and feet - the latter appearing whenever the player flies down to ground level at the bottom of the screen) must stop the alien invasion to restore peace to the Fantasy Zone, as well as finding his missing father, 'Opapa', in the process.
fantzone.desc: 幻想地帶正受到一支由無情但又可愛的外星敵人組成的軍隊的攻擊。一位名叫“Opa-opa”（一種與遊戲中的敵人一樣可愛的飛船，具有翅膀和腳 - 每當玩家飛到屏幕底部的地面時，後者就會出現）的無所畏懼的太空戰鬥機必須阻止外星人入侵，以恢復幻想區的和平，並在此過程中找到他失踪的父親“Opapa”。

toobin.name: 悔改'
toobin.original_desc: Toobin' involves Biff and Jet racing their way down the rapids of a river, riding on tires. You rotate your tyre left or right, and drift as the current sends you, making sure to avoid the banks of the river, and the dividing lines in the middle. Hazards include crocodiles, stray logs and branches, and fishermen - you are armed with a limited supply of tin cans to take care of these. There are gates to slide through on the way down - these give you a points bonus. Each level has a strict time limit to adhere to, although there's a kickin' party at the end if you succeed.
toobin.desc: 《圖賓》中，比夫和傑特騎著輪胎沿著急流沖下。您向左或向右旋轉輪胎，並隨著水流向您漂流，確保避開河岸和中間的分界線。危險包括鱷魚、散落的原木和樹枝以及漁民——你配備了有限的錫罐來處理這些。向下的路上有一些門可以滑過——這些會給你積分獎勵。每個級別都有嚴格的時間限制，儘管如果你成功了，最後還會有一場踢球派對。

ikari3nr.name: ikari III - 救援
ikari3nr.original_desc: Two shirtless Rambo-type players fight their way behind enemy lines to rescue a kidnapped hostage. Various military types must be killed by fist, knife, foot or gun. The players are occasionally marauded by tanks and
ikari3nr.desc: 兩名赤裸上身的蘭博型玩家在敵後殺出一條血路，營救一名被綁架的人質。各種軍事類型必須用拳、刀、腳或槍殺死。玩家偶爾會被坦克掠奪

foodf.name: 食物大戰
foodf.original_desc:
Food Fight © 1982 Atari.

The player, as Charley Chuck, must dodge all kinds of flying fruit and vegetables and try to eat an ice cream cone before it melts. How many ice cream cones can he eat? Your players will soon find out in this incredible video feast. As an ice cream cone melts on the other side of the screen, Charley Chuck just naturally has to go for it, But he must get past Oscar, Angelo, Jacques and Zorba, four chefs who unexpectedly pop out of holes, chase Charley Chuck and throw food at him. They all have different personalities and they're all out to stop Charley Chuck if he isn't fast enough. There are piles of tomatoes, peas, bananas, pies and watermelon Charley Chuck can use to defend himself from the persistent chefs. The player controls Charley Chuck with an analog joystick which allows 360 degree movement on the playfield, and a Throw button, used when Charley Chuck needs to throw food at one of the chefs.
foodf.desc:
食物大戰1982 年雅達利。

玩家扮演查理查克，必須躲避各種飛來飛去的水果和蔬菜，並嘗試在蛋捲冰淇淋融化之前吃掉它。他可以吃多少甜筒冰淇淋？您的玩家很快就會在這場令人難以置信的視頻盛宴中找到答案。當一個蛋捲冰淇淋在屏幕的另一邊融化時，查理·查克很自然地必須去吃它，但他必須越過奧斯卡、安傑洛、雅克和佐巴這四位廚師，他們意外地從洞裡跳出來，追趕查理·查克並向他扔食物。他們都有不同的性格，如果查理查克不夠快，他們就會全力阻止他。查克可以用成堆的西紅柿、豌豆、香蕉、餡餅和西瓜來抵禦頑固的廚師。玩家使用模擬操縱桿控制查理查克，該操縱桿允許在遊戲場上 360 度移動，並使用投擲按鈕，當查理查克需要向其中一位廚師扔食物時使用。

spyhunt.name: 間諜獵人
spyhunt.original_desc:
Spy Hunter is an action/driving game. It places the player as the driver of a G-6155 CIA Prototype Interceptor sports car. The object of the game is to travel the freeways and waterways, hunting down and destroying as many enemy vehicles as possible, all the while not harming civilian vehicles. The view is top-down and the screen scrolls vertically underneath the player's car.

The game begins with the player driving the G-6155. Soon, the player starts to encounter enemy vehicles which try to force the player's car off the road and crash. Each enemy vehicle has its own special feature, such as tire slashers or bulletproof armor.

Points are scored for driving on the road and for destroying enemy vehicles. There is a lead-in time when the player has an endless supply of cars. After this time expires, the player will lose a life each time the car crashes. Extra cars can be earned with high scores. The first extra car is earned at a default value of 30,000 points, but this value can vary depending on settings.
spyhunt.desc:
間諜獵人是一款動作/駕駛遊戲。玩家將扮演一輛 G-6155 CIA 原型攔截跑車的駕駛員。遊戲的目標是在高速公路和水道上行駛，追捕並摧毀盡可能多的敵方車輛，同時不傷害民用車輛。視圖是自上而下的，屏幕在玩家汽車下方垂直滾動。

遊戲從玩家駕駛 G-6155 開始。很快，玩家開始遇到敵方車輛，這些車輛試圖迫使玩家的汽車離開道路並墜毀。每輛敵方車輛都有自己的特殊功能，例如輪胎切割器或防彈裝甲。

在道路上駕駛和摧毀敵方車輛即可得分。當玩家擁有無限的汽車供應時，有一個導入時間。過了這個時間後，每次車禍玩家都會失去一條生命。高分可以獲得額外的汽車。第一輛額外汽車的默認值為 30,000 點，但該值可能會根據設置而變化。

deadconx.name: 連接失效
deadconx.original_desc: Mobsters & criminals own the streets. Law enforcement has taken a backseat against the criminal empire that overwhelms the city and innocent people turn up dead with each passing moment. Take control of 4 brave vigilantes and exterminate the criminals using their rules! Features excellent sound effects as well as fast & furious action with plenty of weapons & stuff to find!
deadconx.desc: 暴徒和罪犯佔領了街道。面對席捲整個城市的犯罪帝國，執法部門已經退居二線，無辜的人每時每刻都在死亡。控制 4 名勇敢的治安維持者並利用他們的規則消滅罪犯！具有出色的音效以及快速而激烈的動作，還有大量武器和物品可供尋找！

megaman2.name: 《洛克人 2：力量戰士》
megaman2.original_desc: Building upon the previous game, you must battle Dr. Wily's evil robot criminals with the help of Megaman, Protoman, Bass & Duo. Features cool 2-D graphics and the same tried & true Mega Man controls. Pay attention to Dr. Light's advice and you may reach Dr. Wily's fortress and come out victorious!
megaman2.desc: 在前一款遊戲的基礎上，您必須在 Megaman、Protoman、Bass 和 Duo 的幫助下對抗 Wily 博士的邪惡機器人罪犯。具有炫酷的 2D 圖形和同樣經過驗證的真正的《洛克人》控件。留意Light博士的建議，你就有可能到達Wily博士的堡壘並取得勝利！

sgemf.name: 超級寶石鬥士：迷你混合版
sgemf.original_desc:
Super Gem Fighter: Mini Mix / Pocket Fighter is a superb, abstract and humorous fighting game featuring miniaturized renditions from several Capcom fighting games; including the legendary "Street Fighter" series, as well as "Darkstalkers" and the little-known "Red Earth".

During a bout, players will be able to release coloured gems from successful attacks against their opponent, as well as from wooden chests that regularly appear. Collecting these gems will 'power-up' the player's character, giving them more powerful attacks. There are two bars and three sub-bars in the interface. The two main bars are the life bar and the super bar; the first indicates the player's health and the second their ability to throw super combos. The Super Bar itself can be filled up to nine levels, allowing players to execute more super combos. Each super combo has a level assigned to it, and it uses Super Bars depending on it.
sgemf.desc:
Super Gem Fighter: Mini Mix / Pocket Fighter 是一款出色、抽象且幽默的格鬥遊戲，以多款 Capcom 格鬥遊戲的微型版本為特色；包括傳奇的《街頭霸王》系列，以及《暗黑行者》和鮮為人知的《紅地球》。

在比賽中，玩家將能夠從對對手的成功攻擊以及定期出現的木箱中釋放彩色寶石。收集這些寶石將“增強”玩家的角色，賦予他們更強大的攻擊力。界面中有兩個欄和三個子欄。兩個主要的欄是生命欄和超級欄；第一個表示玩家的健康狀況，第二個表示他們投出超級連擊的能力。超級欄本身最多可填充九層，讓玩家能夠執行更多超級連擊。每個超級組合都有一個分配給它的級別，並且它根據它使用超級條。

ikarijpb.name: 碇戰士
ikarijpb.original_desc:
Ikari Warriors is a vertically-scrolling run 'n' gun shoot-em-up in which one or two players take on the roles of two bandana-wearing musclebound soldiers as they engage in jungle warfare, fighting over land and water to reach the village of Ikari.

Players can rotate their guns through 360 degrees, allowing them to fire and move in all directions. Standing between the soldiers and their destination is a multitude of enemy soldiers, tanks, helicopters and reinforced bunkers. 

The enemy soldiers utilise a number of different weapons, including machine-guns, grenades, super grenades and flame-throwers. The game's standard enemy troops wear blue uniforms, but there are also enemies in red uniforms that when killed, often drop power-ups that either give players more ammunition, increase the power of bullets and grenades or even kill all enemies on the screen. The players' munitions are limited in number so additional ammo and grenades must to be picked up along the way. 

While most of the action takes place on foot, unoccupied enemy tanks can be found that can be entered and driven. Tanks offer increased firepower as well as resistance to enemy shots. Too many enemy hits, however, will eventually see the tank explode, this is proceeded by a warning flash to allow the player to exit the tank before the explosion. Should the player be caught inside when the tank explodes, a life is lost. Tanks also have a limited amount of fuel but extra fuel can be found to replenish it.

Another obstacle that players need to be wary of, whether on foot or in a tank, are hidden land-mines. These cannot initially be seen put will appear and flash as the player approaches. These cannot be destroyed and contact with them results in an instant death.

Unlike most arcade games, Ikari Warriors is not separated into different stages; the game takes place over one huge, scrolling stage. Ikari Warriors does have a continue feature, but it's only possible to continue from where the last game ended by first holding down the FIRE button, then pressing the start button. Simply pressing the start button restarts the game from the very beginning.
ikarijpb.desc:
《Ikari Warriors》是一款垂直捲軸跑動射擊遊戲，一到兩名玩家扮演兩名戴著頭巾、肌肉發達的士兵，參與叢林戰爭，爭奪土地和水域，以到達 Ikari 村莊。

玩家可以將槍旋轉 360 度，從而可以向各個方向射擊和移動。擋在士兵們和目的地之間的是大量敵方士兵、坦克、直升機和加固掩體。

敵方士兵使用多種不同的武器，包括機槍、手榴彈、超級手榴彈和火焰噴射器。遊戲中的標準敵方部隊穿著藍色制服，但也有穿著紅色制服的敵人，當他們被殺死時，通常會掉落能量道具，這些道具可以為玩家提供更多彈藥，增加子彈和手榴彈的威力，甚至殺死屏幕上的所有敵人。玩家的彈藥數量有限，因此必須沿途拾取額外的彈藥和手榴彈。

雖然大部分行動都是步行進行，但仍可以找到未佔領的敵方坦克，可以進入並駕駛。坦克提供更強的火力以及對敵人射擊的抵抗力。然而，太多的敵人命中最終會導致坦克爆炸，這是通過警告閃光來允許玩家在爆炸前退出坦克的。如果玩家在坦克爆炸時被困在裡面，就會失去生命。坦克的燃料數量也有限，但可以找到額外的燃料來補充。

無論是步行還是在坦克中，玩家需要警惕的另一個障礙是隱藏的地雷。這些最初是看不見的，但會隨著玩家的接近而出現並閃爍。它們無法被摧毀，接觸它們會導致立即死亡。

與大多數街機遊戲不同，碇勇士並沒有分為不同的階段；遊戲發生在一個巨大的滾動舞台上。Ikari Warriors 確實有繼續功能，但只有先按住 FIRE 按鈕，然後按開始按鈕才能從上一場比賽結束的地方繼續。只需按下開始按鈕即可從頭開始重新開始遊戲。

peterpak.name: 彼得·帕克·拉特
peterpak.original_desc:
Peter Pack Rat is a platform game in which the player, controlling the game's hero, a rat called Peter; must rush around a platform-filled screen collecting a variety of objects to take back to Peter's nest. These objects include bottles, watches, hats, balls, and cans.

A number of enemy creatures hinder the player's progress; these include rats, cats, dogs, bats and owls. There are 3 different levels to play through; a junkyard, a sewer and a tree.

As well as the objects that must be collected and taken to Peter's nest, additional objects can also be collected and thrown to stun attacking animals. Flying animals that have been stunned can be ridden around the screen for a short period of time. A round ends when all the desired objects have been collected and placed in the nest. Successive rounds add more objects and enemies, as well as changing the patterns of the shortcuts.
peterpak.desc:
Peter Pack Rat 是一款平台遊戲，玩家控制遊戲的英雄，一隻名叫 Peter 的老鼠；必須在充滿平台的屏幕上奔跑，收集各種物品帶回彼得的巢穴。這些物品包括瓶子、手錶、帽子、球和罐頭。

許多敵人生物會阻礙玩家的前進；其中包括老鼠、貓、狗、蝙蝠和貓頭鷹。有 3 個不同的關卡可供玩；一個垃圾場、一條下水道和一棵樹。

除了必須收集並帶到彼得巢穴的物品外，還可以收集並投擲其他物品來擊暈攻擊的動物。被擊暈的飛行動物可以在屏幕上短時間騎行。當所有想要的物品都被收集並放置在巢中時，一輪結束。連續的回合會添加更多的物體和敵人，並改變快捷方式的模式。

shinobi.name: 忍
shinobi.original_desc:
Shinobi is a scrolling platform beat-em-up in which the player takes on the role of Joe Musashi, a Shinobi Ninja, who must fight his way through 5 tough missions - each made up of between 3 to 5 stages - in his quest to rescue the kidnapped Ninja children of the Iga clan; now hostages of an evil Ninja syndicate called "Zeed". To complete a mission, the player must rescue all of the kidnapped children on each level, with the number of hostages remaining displayed on a meter in the bottom left corner of the screen.

Shinobi was a huge success for Sega, and deservedly so. Its perfectly realized blend of platform and fighting action and is as fine an exponent of the 'easy to get into, difficult to master' gameplay ethic as video games have seen.
shinobi.desc:
Shinobi 是一款捲軸平台清版遊戲，玩家扮演忍者喬武藏 (Joe Musashi) 的角色，他必須完成 5 個艱鉅的任務（每個任務由 3 到 5 個階段組成），以營救被綁架的伊賀氏族忍者孩子；現在是一個名為“Zeed”的邪惡忍者集團的人質。為了完成任務，玩家必須營救每個關卡中所有被綁架的兒童，屏幕左下角的儀表上會顯示剩餘的人質數量。

《忍者》為世嘉帶來了巨大的成功，這是當之無愧的。它完美地融合了平台和戰鬥動作，並且像電子遊戲一樣完美地體現了“容易上手，難以掌握”的遊戲道德。

rocnrope.name: 洛克繩索
rocnrope.original_desc:
Roc'n Rope is an incredibly difficult yet playable platform game featuring four different levels. The player takes on the role of a an archaeologist whose mission is to return the missing tail feathers to the golden Phoenix. The archaeologist is armed with a harpoon gun and uses it to fire a rope into a platform above, in order to climb up the rope and progress up the level. This is vaguely similar to the superb 'telescopic arm' feature that appeared in Capcom's superb "Bionic Commando".

All levels are patrolled by enemies in the form of dinosaurs and cavemen and all are deadly to the touch. Some cavemen will pull on the harpoon rope while the archaeologist is climbing it. This will result in the player falling from the rope and losing a life. The archaeologist is armed with a light ray that will kill the enemies.

A breakdown of the game's four levels:

The first level is possibly the most difficult in the game. Players begin at the bottom left of the screen and must work their way up to the Roc, who is sitting at the upper right of the screen. There are many layers of ledges coming out from the sides of the screen. While the middle of the screen is open to the sky (except for a few floating platforms). To reach the top, players must use the harpoon gun to climb diagonally back and forth until they reach the top (ensuring that the Phoenix feathers have been collected on the way).
The second level is set underground. There are a lot of dinosaurs on this screen and far fewer platforms than on the first level. Many of the platforms stretch completely across the screen, so there aren't many pitfalls to be wary of. Once again, players must get the archaeologist to the top of the screen to complete the level.
The third level is set outdoors. A 'ferris wheel' style rotating platform sits in the center of the screen, but this can be avoided if players don't wish to use it. The easiest route to the top is on the right-hand side of the level.
The fourth and final level is shaped a little like a mountain. The player's main concern here is a large waterfall in the center of the screen. Players must time their harpoon climb just right to avoid being killed by the deadly waters. Once this level is finished, the game starts over with an increased level of difficulty.
rocnrope.desc:
Roc'n Rope 是一款極其困難但可玩的平台遊戲，具有四個不同的關卡。玩家扮演一名考古學家，其任務是將丟失的尾羽歸還給金鳳凰。考古學家手持魚叉槍，用它向上面的平台發射一根繩子，以便爬上繩子並向上爬。這與卡普空出色的《仿生突擊隊》中出現的精湛“伸縮臂”功能隱約相似。

所有關卡都有恐龍和穴居人等敵人巡邏，所有關卡都是致命的。當考古學家攀爬時，一些穴居人會拉動魚叉繩。這將導致玩家從繩子上掉下來並失去生命。考古學家配備了可以殺死敵人的光線。

遊戲的四個級別的細分：

第一關可能是遊戲中最困難的。玩家從屏幕左下角開始，必須一路走到坐在屏幕右上角的大鵬。有許多層壁架從屏幕兩側伸出。而屏幕的中間是向天空開放的（除了一些浮動平台）。要到達頂部，玩家必須使用魚叉槍沿對角線來回攀爬，直到到達頂部（確保途中收集到鳳凰羽毛）。
第二層位於地下。這個屏幕上有很多恐龍，但平台比第一層少得多。許多平台完全延伸到屏幕上，因此沒有太多需要警惕的陷阱。再一次，玩家必須讓考古學家到達屏幕頂部才能完成關卡。
第三層設置在室外。屏幕中央有一個“摩天輪”式旋轉平台，但如果玩家不想使用它，可以避免使用它。到達頂部最簡單的路線位於關卡的右側。
第四層也是最後一層的形狀有點像一座山。玩家在這裡主要關心的是屏幕中央的一個大瀑布。玩家必須把握好魚叉攀登的時機，以避免被致命的水域殺死。一旦完成此級別，遊戲就會以更高的難度重新開始。

gradius2.name: 火神創投
gradius2.original_desc: The player returns as the role of the pilot of the Vic Viper spaceship to battle the second onslaughts of the Bacterion Empire, under the new leadership of Gofer, the giant head. Gradius II has kept the gameplay from the original game, but infused it with enhancements brought from the spin-off, Salamander (Life Force). This is primarily evident in two of the weapons configurations that are selectable. Another first in the series was the inclusion of the "boss rush" (also known as "boss parade" or "boss alley"), a level designed entirely with only boss confrontations.
gradius2.desc: 玩家回歸，扮演維克毒蛇號宇宙飛船的飛行員，在巨人頭領戈弗的新領導下，與巴克特里恩帝國的第二次進攻作戰。Gradius II 保留了原版遊戲的遊戲玩法，但融入了衍生遊戲《Salamander（生命力）》帶來的增強功能。這主要體現在兩種可選擇的武器配置中。該系列的另一個首創是加入了“Boss rush”（也稱為“Boss Parade”或“Boss Alley”），這是一個完全只包含 Boss 對抗的關卡。

willow.name: 柳
willow.original_desc:
Willow is a sideways scrolling platform shoot-em-up game loosely based upon the movie of the same name. Players take on the role of one of two characters: Willow Ufgood or Madmartigan. The hero's mission is to rescue the baby Elora Danan from the evil Queen Bavmorda and bring her back safely. If the quest fails, the Queen will plunge the world into darkness and chaos.

The game consists of 6 levels, each representing a scene from the movie. Defeated enemies drop gold coins that can be collected by the player. In addition, each level is littered with locked treasure chests that can be shot open and the treasure within collected. The gold can be used to purchase a number of weapons and character power-ups from a nearby shop (represented on screen by a wise old man). All power-ups will stay with the player until all lives are lost and the game is over.
willow.desc:
Willow 是一款橫向捲軸平台射擊遊戲，大致改編自同名電影。玩家扮演兩個角色之一：Willow Ufgood 或 Madmartigan。英雄的任務是從邪惡的巴夫莫達女王手中救出嬰兒埃洛拉·達南並將她安全帶回來。如果任務失敗，女王將使世界陷入黑暗和混亂。

遊戲由 6 個關卡組成，每個關卡代表電影中的一個場景。擊敗的敵人會掉落金幣，玩家可以收集這些金幣。此外，每個關卡都散佈著上鎖的寶箱，可以將其打開並收集其中的寶藏。黃金可用於從附近的商店（屏幕上由一位聰明的老人代表）購買許多武器和角色強化道具。所有的能量提升都會保留在玩家身上，直到所有生命都消失並且遊戲結束。

mainev2p.name: 主賽事
mainev2p.original_desc: A wrestling game in which you select 2 wrestlers from a choice of 8 and compete in tag-team battles.
mainev2p.desc: 一種摔跤遊戲，您可以從 8 名摔跤手中選出 2 名，並參加雙打比賽。

godzilla.name: 哥斯拉
godzilla.original_desc: This arcade game has a few monsters that are playable, a few that can't be played as and a few that make cameos. All playable monsters in the 1 Player game (except for the one you play as) have many more abilities than what can be accessed in Battle Mode. All monsters can jump, jump and kick/punch, do a tail swipe, grab and throw, punch and kick, and block. Most have a beam weapon, though some don't. All playable monsters have alternate colors to distinguish between the same monster in muliplayer mode.
godzilla.desc: 這款街機遊戲有一些可以玩的怪物，一些不能玩的怪物，還有一些可以客串的怪物。1 人遊戲中的所有可玩怪物（除了您所扮演的怪物）都擁有比戰鬥模式更多的能力。所有怪物都可以跳躍、跳躍和踢/拳、尾巴掃擊、抓取和投擲、拳打腳踢以及格擋。大多數人都有光束武器，但也有一些沒有。所有可玩的怪物都有替代顏色，以區分多人遊戲模式中的同一怪物。

1943kai.name: 第1943章 許多：如何中途島
1943kai.original_desc: An update of 1943 with tweaked weapons, fewer levels, and a new soundtrack.
1943kai.desc: 1943 年的更新，調整了武器，減少了關卡，並添加了新的配樂。

congo.name: 剛果邦戈
congo.original_desc: Congo Bongo is an isometric platform game and is Sega's take on Nintendo's legendary "Donkey Kong". The game begins with an animated cut-scene showing Bongo the gorilla as approaches the campsite of a sleeping safari hunter and
congo.desc: Congo Bongo 是一款等距平台遊戲，是世嘉對任天堂傳奇“大金剛”的演繹。遊戲以動畫過場動畫開始，顯示大猩猩邦戈接近熟睡的狩獵獵人的露營地並

gorf.name: 喬倫
gorf.original_desc:
The player's goal is to defeat the Gorfian Empire and safeguard the future of mankind. Gorf is a single screen shoot-em-up in the classic "Space Invaders" mould, the prime difference being that Gorf offers five distinct levels of shooting action. The levels are as follows: 

Mission 1 - Astro Battles: The first mission is more or less a straight clone of "Space Invaders", set against a sky-blue background. The player is protected by a glittering parabolic force field, which is gradually worn away by enemy projectiles. The force field also works in BOTH directions, and therefore must momentarily deactivate in order for the player's ship to fire out. To advance to the next mission, the player must destroy all the invaders. 
Mission 2 - Laser Attack: The other missions are all set in space. In this mission, the player is faced with two formations each made up of five enemies. The formations are cross-shaped, and at the bottom of each formation is a single laser gun. The laser guns fire a long, dangerous yellow beam at regular intervals. At the same time, the other enemies may break formation and attempt to dive-bomb the player. Destroying a laser gun causes the corresponding formation to break apart. To advance to the next mission, the player must destroy all the enemies. 
Mission 3 - Galaxians: This mission is a clone of "Galaxian". The player is faced with a swarm of galaxians, which continually dive-bomb and shower the player with deadly projectiles. To advance to the next mission, the player must destroy all the galaxians. 
Mission 4 - Space Warp: A wormhole is situated in the middle of the screen out of which enemies ships emerge, one at a time, and spiral outward at increasing speed; whilst growing larger and flinging fireballs at the player. The Space Warp level would have an influence on Konami's superb "Gyruss", released two years later. To advance to the next mission, the player must survive a number of these enemies. 
Mission 5, Flag Ship: The final mission is a one-on-one confrontation with the alien Flag Ship itself. The Flag Ship is one of the earliest examples of the 'boss' enemy in mainstream video games. It is equipped with its own force field, through which the player must blast in order to get a clean shot on the ship. It is also armed with a powerful fireball weapon. The player's weapon has a minor effect on the Flag Ship's hull, and can only blast off tiny pieces of it. This adds to the player's problems, as stray pieces of hull can destroy their ship. These pieces can be destroyed with a single shot. The only way to destroy the Flag Ship is to hit the glowing reactor at the heart of the ship, either by first blasting away the hull to expose it, or by managing to fire a shot directly into the tiny vent that leads to the reactor. 

Each time the Flag Ship is destroyed, the player advances in rank. Initially, the player begins with the rank of Space Cadet, before moving on to Space Captain, Space Colonel, Space General, Space Warrior, and finally Space Avenger. The player's spaceship is equipped with a Quark Laser which allows the player to cancel a poorly aimed shot and fire another shot.
gorf.desc:
玩家的目標是打敗戈爾菲安帝國，保衛人類的未來。《Gorf》是一款採用經典“太空侵略者”模式的單屏射擊遊戲，主要區別在於《Gorf》提供了五種不同級別的射擊動作。級別如下：

任務 1 - Astro Battles：第一個任務或多或少是“太空入侵者”的直接克隆，背景為天藍色。玩家受到閃閃發光的拋物線力場的保護，該力場會逐漸被敵人的射彈磨損。力場也在兩個方向上起作用，因此必須暫時停用才能讓玩家的飛船開火。為了進入下一個任務，玩家必須消滅所有入侵者。
任務2-激光攻擊：其他任務均以太空為背景。在這個任務中，玩家面臨著兩個編隊，每個編隊由五個敵人組成。陣型呈十字形，每個陣型的底部都有一門激光槍。激光槍定期發射一束危險的黃色長光束。與此同時，其他敵人可能會打破隊形並嘗試俯衝轟炸玩家。摧毀激光槍會導致相應的編隊解體。為了進入下一個任務，玩家必須消滅所有敵人。
任務3 - 銀河人：該任務是“銀河人”的克隆。玩家面對的是一群星系，它們不斷地向玩家俯衝轟炸並向玩家發射致命的射彈。為了進入下一個任務，玩家必須消滅所有銀河人。
任務 4 - 空間扭曲：屏幕中央有一個蟲洞，敵方飛船從其中出現，一次一艘，並以越來越快的速度向外螺旋；同時變大並向玩家投擲火球。空間扭曲關卡對兩年後發布的 Konami 出色的“Gyruss”產生了影響。為了進入下一個任務，玩家必須在眾多敵人中生存下來。
任務5，旗艦：最終任務是與外星旗艦進行一對一的對抗。旗艦是主流電子遊戲中“頭目”敵人最早的例子之一。它配備了自己的力場，玩家必須通過它進行爆炸才能在船上獲得乾淨的射擊。它還配備了強大的火球武器。玩家的武器對旗艦船體的影響很小，只能炸掉它的小碎片。這增加了玩家的問題，因為散落的船體碎片可能會摧毀他們的船隻。這些碎片可以用一發子彈摧毀。摧毀旗艦的唯一方法是擊中船中心的發光反應堆，要么首先炸毀船體使其暴露，要么直接向通向反應堆的微小通風口開槍。

每次旗艦被摧毀，玩家的等級就會提升。最初，玩家的軍銜是太空學員，然後是太空隊長、太空上校、太空將軍、太空戰士，最後是太空復仇者。玩家的宇宙飛船配備了夸克激光，可以讓玩家取消瞄準不佳的射擊並發射另一次射擊。

kick.name: 踢
kick.original_desc: Move a man on a unicycle and catch falling balloons and Pac-Men on your head. Use the Kick button to make the character's legs kick out and knock balloons back up for another try. Balloons stack up eight high and then the man will pop them. Stack Pac-Men for bonus points.
kick.desc: 移動一個騎獨輪車的人，用你的頭接住掉落的氣球和吃豆人。使用“踢”按鈕使角色的腿踢出，並將氣球擊回以進行另一次嘗試。氣球堆成八層高，然後這個人就會把它們彈出。堆疊吃豆人以獲得獎勵積分。

btime.name: 漢堡時間
btime.original_desc:
A platform game in which one or two players take on the role of burger chef 'Peter Pepper'. The chef must create a set number of burgers per level by collecting the separate ingredients needed to make each one (two pieces of bun, the burger itself and/or a garnish, such as lettuce or cheese). 

Each screen is made up of platforms joined by connecting ladders. At the bottom of the screen are a number of empty plates while the burger ingredients lay across the platforms directly above the plates. The chef must walk across the entire width of the ingredients to make them drop to the platform below. A burger is only completed once all of its ingredients have been dropped onto the corresponding plate at the bottom of the screen. 

The chef's efforts are hampered by the rogue ingredients that are constantly chasing him. They are called 'Mr. Hot Dog', 'Mr. Egg' and 'Mr. Pickle'. Any contact with them results in the loss of a life. The chef can temporarily freeze the enemies by throwing pepper at them. He only carries a limited amount of pepper but this can be replenished by collecting the bonus food items that randomly appear (ice cream cones, coffee, and fries). In addition to the pepper, any enemies located on a platform below the chef can be killed by dropping an available burger ingredient on top of them. .
btime.desc:
一款平台遊戲，一到兩名玩家扮演漢堡廚師“Peter Pepper”的角色。廚師必須通過收集製作每個漢堡所需的單獨原料（兩塊麵包、漢堡本身和/或裝飾物，例如生菜或奶酪）來創建每個級別的一定數量的漢堡。

每個屏幕都由通過連接梯子連接的平台組成。屏幕底部有許多空盤子，而漢堡配料則位於盤子正上方的平台上。廚師必須走過原料的整個寬度，使它們落到下面的平台上。只有將所有成分都放到屏幕底部相應的盤子上時，漢堡才算完成。

不斷追趕他的流氓食材阻礙了廚師的努力。他們被稱為“先生”。熱狗”、“先生”蛋”和“先生”泡菜'。與他們的任何接觸都會導致生命損失。廚師可以通過向敵人扔胡椒來暫時凍結敵人。他只攜帶有限數量的胡椒，但可以通過收集隨機出現的獎勵食品（冰淇淋甜筒、咖啡和薯條）來補充。除了胡椒之外，位於廚師下方平台上的任何敵人都可以通過將可用的漢堡原料扔在他們上面來殺死。。

sf1us.name: 快打旋風6
sf1us.original_desc: Martial arts masters Ryu and Ken enter a worldwide martial arts tournament spanning 5 nations as they face 10 of the world's greatest fighters. The game can be played alone or with 2 players competing, with Player 1 taking the role of Ryu and Player 2 as Ken. The predecessor to the ultra-popular "Street Fighter II - The World Warrior".
sf1us.desc: 武術大師 Ryu 和 Ken 參加跨越 5 個國家的全球武術錦標賽，與世界上最偉大的 10 名拳擊手對戰。該遊戲可以單獨玩，也可以與 2 名玩家競爭，玩家 1 扮演 Ryu，玩家 2 扮演 Ken。超受歡迎的《街頭霸王 II - 世界戰士》的前身。

lifefrce.name: 蠑
lifefrce.original_desc:
Salamander is a 1 or 2 player sequel to 1985's superb shoot-em-up, "Nemesis". While it retained the same basic gameplay and feel of its predecessor (particularly the superb and innovative weapons system), Salamander featured both superior graphics and a more imaginative approach to level design. The earliest example of the latter appears towards the end of the very first level, in which imposing, organic obstructions grow before the players' eyes. The game's third level - the infamous 'lava' level - is another good example of Salamander's superb design; with huge solar flares constantly erupting both above and below the player's ship that must be carefully navigated to avoid instant loss of life. Salamander introduced further variety to the action with the introduction vertically-scrolling levels, which alternated with the standard side-scrolling levels.

Salamander's weapon power-up system is as follows:
SPEED UP: Five speed levels.
MISSILE: Press missile button to launch.
LASER: Your forward rockets turn into deadly lasers.
RIPPLE LASER: Use shoot button to fire.
FORCE FIELD: Protect your ship with barriers.
MULTIPLE: Increase your fire power by up to four times.

Multiple special powers can be obtained, but the LASER cannot be used in conjunction with the RIPPLE Laser.
lifefrce.desc:
《Salamander》是 1985 年精彩射擊遊戲《Nemesis》的 1 或 2 人續作。雖然它保留了與前作相同的基本遊戲玩法和感覺（特別是精湛且創新的武器系統），但《火蜥蜴》具有卓越的圖形和更具想像力的關卡設計方法。後者最早的例子出現在第一關的末尾，在玩家眼前出現了巨大的有機障礙物。遊戲的第三關——臭名昭著的“熔岩”關——是 Salamander 精湛設計的另一個很好的例子；巨大的太陽耀斑不斷在玩家飛船的上方和下方爆發，玩家必須小心駕駛以避免立即喪生。《火蜥蜴》引入了垂直滾動關卡，與標準的橫向滾動關卡交替使用，進一步豐富了遊戲的多樣性。

Salamander的武器強化系統如下：
加速：五個速度級別。
導彈：按下導彈按鈕即可發射。
激光：你的前進火箭變成致命的激光。
波紋激光：使用射擊按鈕開火。
力場：用障礙物保護你的船。
多重：將你的火力增加至多四倍。

可以獲得多種特殊功率，但激光不能與波紋激光結合使用。

looping.name: 循環播放
looping.original_desc:
As the player begins his flight into Adventure-Land, his airplane is quickly surrounded by hot air balloons. WATCH OUT! These seemingly innocent colorful objects mean destruction.

Immediately the Player's flying skills are tested. The hot air balloons challenge and engage the Player in a fierce dogfight. The Player must loop his plane to avoid and destroy the swirling balloons.

As the Player continues his journey into Adventure-Land he encounters the Maze Tunnel. Now the Player must guide and loop his airplane through the labyrinth with precision movements.
looping.desc:
當玩家開始飛往冒險樂園時，他的飛機很快就被熱氣球包圍。當心！這些看似無辜的彩色物體意味著破壞。

玩家的飛行技能立即受到測試。熱氣球向玩家發出挑戰，並與玩家展開激烈的混戰。玩家必須讓飛機盤旋以避免並摧毀旋轉的氣球。

當玩家繼續進入冒險世界時，他會遇到迷宮隧道。現在，玩家必須引導他的飛機以精確的動作穿過迷宮。

superpac.name: 超級吃豆人
superpac.original_desc: Super Pac-Man is a 1- or 2-player game where you are in control of the legendary Pac-Man. As in the original "Pac-Man" game, the goal is to clear each maze, but this time, instead of dots, the maze consists of prizes which are locked away behind gates. There are two ways to access the prizes. You can eat the keys which open a particular gate, and not always the gate which is closest to that key. Or you can crash through the gate after you eat a Super Pill and become Super Pac-Man. You are not required to eat all of the keys in order to complete the stage.
superpac.desc: Super Pac-Man 是一款 1 人或 2 人遊戲，您可以控制傳奇的吃豆人。與最初的“吃豆人”遊戲一樣，目標是清除每個迷宮，但這一次，迷宮不是由點組成，而是由鎖在門後的獎品組成。有兩種方式可以獲得獎品。你可以吃掉打開特定門的鑰匙，但並不總是最接近該鑰匙的門。或者，您可以在吃下超級藥丸後衝進大門，成為超級吃豆人。您無需吃掉所有鑰匙即可完成該階段。

gaunt22p.name: 挑戰2
gaunt22p.original_desc:
Gauntlet II is a direct sequel to the legendary maze-based fantasy themed shoot-em-up, released a year earlier. Atari chose not to tinker with the core game-play mechanic to any great degree, opting instead to enhance the already excellent multi-player action that had created such a stir upon the original game's release.

As with its prequel, up to four players once again take on the role of either 'Thor the Warrior', 'Thyra the Valkyrie', 'Merlin the Wizard', or 'Questor the Elf' and must play cooperatively as they explore and fight their way through the enemy-packed mazes, collecting potions, food and treasure as they searched for the exit that would lead them to the next dungeon.

Changes to the sequel included the ability for players to play whatever character they wanted, even if that character was already in play. Characters were now colour-coded and players would find themselves taking on the role of 'Blue Elf', 'Green Wizard', etc. New in-game speech was added to allow for the new player definitions.

Other changes included the ability to 'bounce' shots off walls - known as 'Reflective Shots' - providing the correct potion was picked up. As well as new potions, Gauntlet II also featured several new monsters. The most notorious of the new additions was the Fire-breathing Dragon that guards the exit to some dungeons. This powerful creature takes multiple hits to kill and defeating it would see the players rewarded with a permanent potion and a bag of treasure.

Another notable addition was the 'It' monster: any player who was tagged by the creature would suddenly find that all of that level's monsters would ONLY chase the tagged player, completely ignoring the presence of all other players. The only way to remove this curse was to tag another player, thus making them 'it'.

New level elements were also added to further increase variety. These included dungeons with entirely invisible walls, magical walls (which changed into monsters or items when hit), stun tiles (which stunned any player that walked on them) and exits that flashed between functioning and non-functioning.
gaunt22p.desc:
《Gauntlet II》是一年前發布的傳奇迷宮奇幻主題射擊遊戲的直接續集。雅達利選擇不對核心遊戲機制進行任何重大修改，而是選擇增強本已出色的多人遊戲動作，這些動作在原版遊戲發佈時引起瞭如此大的轟動。

與前傳一樣，最多四名玩家再次扮演“戰士雷神”、“女武神塞拉”、“巫師梅林”或“精靈探索者”的角色，他們必須合作探索，在充滿敵人的迷宮中殺出一條血路，在尋找通往下一個地牢的出口時收集藥水、食物和寶藏。

續作的變化包括玩家可以扮演他們想要的任何角色，即使該角色已經在玩。角色現在採用顏色編碼，玩家會發現自己扮演“藍色精靈”、“綠色巫師”等角色。添加了新的遊戲內語音以允許新的玩家定義。

其他變化包括從牆上“反彈”射擊的能力 - 稱為“反射射擊” - 只要拾取正確的藥水即可。除了新藥水外，《Gauntlet II》還包含一些新怪物。新添加的內容中最臭名昭著的是守衛某些地牢出口的噴火龍。這種強大的生物需要多次攻擊才能殺死，擊敗它將使玩家獲得永久藥劑和一袋寶藏作為獎勵。

另一個值得注意的補充是“It”怪物：任何被該生物標記的玩家會突然發現該級別的所有怪物只會追逐被標記的玩家，完全忽略所有其他玩家的存在。消除這個詛咒的唯一方法是標記另一個玩家，從而使他們成為“它”。

還添加了新的關卡元素以進一步增加多樣性。其中包括具有完全隱形牆壁的地下城、魔法牆壁（被擊中時會變成怪物或物品）、眩暈瓷磚（使任何在其上行走的玩家暈眩）以及在功能和非功能之間閃爍的出口。

irobot.name: 我，機器人
irobot.original_desc:
I, Robot is a 3-D shoot-em-up in which the player controls the "Unhappy Interface Robot #1984"; a servant robot who has become self-aware and decided to rebel against the all-controlling Big Brother and his ever-watchful 'Evil Eyes'.

The game is set over a series of platform-based stages constructed from solid coloured blocks and to complete a stage, players must "eliminate the red zones". This is achieved by moving the robot over all of a stage's red surfaces, changing their colour to blue. The colour scheme - including target colour - changes every 26 levels, however. So while the target colour is red for the first 26 screens, it becomes yellow from Level 27, blue from Level 53 and magenta from Level 79.

In order to reach all of the platforms and surfaces, the Interface robot will need to jump. This must be carefully timed, however, as jumping is not allowed under Big Brother's strict regime and his Evil eye - sitting atop a pyramid at the back of the playfield - will open at regular intervals to watch over the interface robot. Should the eye be fully open - indicated by it turning red - when the robot is mid-jump, he will be spotted and destroyed, costing the player a life.

Once all of the coloured squares on a stage have been eliminated, the enemy's shield is destroyed and the Interface Robot will need to be guided to a final, previously inaccessible coloured square at the back of the playfield. The Evil Eye is then zapped and destroyed.

Some levels feature different background elements that affect gameplay, such as walls that must be shot and destroyed to reach coloured tiles, or indestructible moving columns that intermittently block access to coloured tiles, making timing difficult. There are also enemies to be shot or avoided, including birds, bombs and flying sharks.
irobot.desc:
《I, Robot》是一款 3D 射擊遊戲，玩家控制“Unhappy Interface Robot #1984”；一個具有自我意識的僕人機器人，決定反抗控制一切的老大哥和他時刻警惕的“邪惡之眼”。

遊戲設置在一系列由純色塊構建的基於平台的舞台上，為了完成一個舞台，玩家必須“消除紅色區域”。這是通過將機器人移動到舞台的所有紅色表面上，將其顏色更改為藍色來實現的。然而，配色方案（包括目標顏色）每 26 個級別就會發生變化。因此，雖然前 26 個屏幕的目標顏色為紅色，但從第 27 級開始變為黃色，從第 53 級開始變為藍色，從第 79 級開始變為洋紅色。

為了到達所有平台和表面，Interface 機器人需要跳躍。然而，這必須仔細安排時間，因為在老大哥的嚴格製度下不允許跳躍，而他的邪惡之眼 - 坐在操場後面的金字塔頂上 - 會定期打開以監視界面機器人。如果眼睛完全睜開（由它變成紅色表示），當機器人在跳躍時，他將被發現並被摧毀，從而導致玩家喪生。

一旦舞台上的所有彩色方塊都被消除，敵人的盾牌就會被摧毀，並且界面機器人將需要被引導到操場後面最後一個以前無法進入的彩色方塊。然後邪眼被摧毀。

某些關卡具有影響遊戲玩法的不同背景元素，例如必須射擊並摧毀才能到達彩色瓷磚的牆壁，或者堅不可摧的移動柱會間歇性地阻止彩色瓷磚的進入，從而使計時變得困難。還有需要射擊或躲避的敵人，包括鳥類、炸彈和飛鯊。

pipedrm.name: 白日夢
pipedrm.original_desc: Put your advanced plumbing skills to the maximum test and connect the points on the board in the least moves possible! Use the pieces of pipe supplied to plug the gaps and fix the leaks as quickly as possible. You're against the clock and at the mercy of pipe supply so think fast and lay pipe quickly!
pipedrm.desc: 最大限度地考驗您先進的管道技能，並以盡可能少的動作連接板上的點！使用提供的管道堵住縫隙並儘快修復洩漏。您必須與時間賽跑，並且受制於管道供應，因此請快速思考并快速鋪設管道！

aquajack.name: 阿奎傑克
aquajack.original_desc: A chase-view shoot'em up were you pilot a hovercraft over water and land while dodging bullets and avoiding objects by either going around them or jumping over them.
aquajack.desc: 這是一款追逐視角的射擊遊戲，您駕駛氣墊船在水面上飛行並著陸，同時躲避子彈，並通過繞過或跳過物體來避開物體。

ctribe.name: 戰鬥部落
ctribe.original_desc: Three player simultaneous melee battle in which larger-than-life fighters battle against rival gang members. As well as being able to pick up objects such as motorcycles etc. and throw them at the enemies, players also have a number of interesting fighting moves that can be unleashed upon their opponents. These include picking up unconscious enemies and hitting OTHER enemies with them, as well as banging two enemies' heads together and smashing recumbent enemies' heads into the ground to finish them off.
ctribe.desc: 三名玩家同時進行近戰戰鬥，傳奇戰士與敵對幫派成員進行戰鬥。除了能夠撿起摩托車等物體並將其扔向敵人之外，玩家還可以向對手釋放許多有趣的戰鬥動作。其中包括抱起失去知覺的敵人並用他們擊中其他敵人，以及將兩個敵人的頭撞在一起以及將躺著的敵人的頭撞到地上以將其殺死。

splatter.name: 潑濺屋
splatter.original_desc: In a dark and stormy night, Rick and his girlfriend Jeniffer take refuge in the creepy West mansion, only to find himself dead and Jeniffer missing! Now, a mysterious sacrificial mask with amazing powers brings him back from the dead and in order to free himself from its curse, he must destroy the evil lurking deep within the mansion and save Jennifer in the process! Features some of the goriest graphics ever seen at its release date, awesome music & sound effects, lots of the typical toys seen in horror flicks (knives, etc.) as well as lots of challenge!
splatter.desc: 在一個漆黑的暴風雨之夜，瑞克和他的女朋友詹妮弗躲進了令人毛骨悚然的西宅，卻發現自己死了，詹妮弗失踪了！現在，一個具有驚人力量的神秘祭祀面具使他起死回生，為了擺脫詛咒，他必須消滅潛伏在宅邸深處的邪惡力量，並在此過程中拯救詹妮弗！具有發布日期以來最血腥的圖形、令人驚嘆的音樂和音效、許多恐怖電影中常見的玩具（刀等）以及大量的挑戰！

tekken.name: 鐵拳
tekken.original_desc: World's 8 best martial artists emerge into 'The King Of Iron Fist Tournament' for winning the title of King of Iron Fist and a large purse of prize money. Every artist will try his best to defeat Heihachi and win the prize money and fame.
tekken.desc: 世界八強武術家參加“鐵拳王爭霸賽”，贏得鐵拳王稱號和巨額獎金。每個藝人都會竭盡全力擊敗平八，贏得獎金和名譽。

ghoulsu.name: 食屍鬼與幽靈
ghoulsu.original_desc: Three years have passed since the events of "Ghosts'n Goblins" and the knight Arthur finds himself once again facing the horrible creatures of Demon World. This time the demons have invaded the kingdom and upon his return, Arthur is the only survivor, his beloved Genever having been killed by Lucifer. Arthur embarks once again on a quest to defeat the demonic invaders and save Genever's soul.
ghoulsu.desc: 距離《鬼魂與哥布林》事件已經過去了三年，亞瑟騎士發現自己再次面對惡魔世界的可怕生物。這次惡魔入侵了王國，亞瑟回來後是唯一的倖存者，他心愛的吉尼弗被路西法殺死了。亞瑟再次踏上擊敗惡魔入侵者並拯救吉尼弗靈魂的旅程。

armwaru.name: 裝甲戰士
armwaru.original_desc:
In the year 2281, the war spanning half a century over territory between the United World Forces and the Raian Kingdom had at last come to an end.

But this peace was not to last. A year after a truce was signed between the two forces, former Raian army captain Azrael, who has converted himself into a cyborg in an attempt to become "the perfect warrior", has marshalled several thousand other cyborgs and declared war against the Raian Kingdom. Robbing mobile weapons from the army, this group of rogues has invaded the Raian capital of Merkid and has begun to abduct the civilians.

The United World Government, receiving an emergency message from the planet Raia, has but one choice: to organize and dispatch an army formed around its elite corps, a squadron of warriors called "Bloody Armor", to eradicate the enemy forces and rescue the civilians.

And so, in October 2282, the United World Forces begin to launch its attack upon the planet Raia.

The most intense battle in human history is about to begin...
armwaru.desc:
2281年，世界聯合軍與拉伊安王國之間長達半個世紀的領土戰爭終於結束。

但這種和平並沒有持續多久。兩軍簽署休戰一年後，前拉伊安軍隊隊長阿茲瑞爾將自己變成了半機械人，試圖成為“完美的戰士”，他召集了數千名其他半機械人向拉伊安王國宣戰。這群盜賊搶走了軍隊的機動武器，入侵了拉伊安首都默基德，並開始綁架平民。

收到來自拉亞星球的緊急信息的世界聯合政府只有一個選擇：組織並派遣一支以精銳軍團為核心的軍隊，名為“血色裝甲”的戰士中隊，消滅敵軍並拯救平民。

於是，2282 年 10 月，世界聯合軍開始對拉亞星球發動攻擊。

人類歷史上最激烈的戰鬥即將開始……

ringking.name: 拳擊手之王
ringking.original_desc: Ring King is a boxing game in which the action in the ring is viewed in a 3D top-down view and a full range of moves is provided, with the standard jabs complimented by body punches and the ability to dodge, duck or raise your guard. Each punch...
ringking.desc: 《Ring King》是一款拳擊遊戲，以 3D 自上而下的視角觀看拳擊場上的動作，並提供全方位的動作，標準的刺拳搭配身體拳擊以及閃避、躲避或提高警惕的能力。每一拳...

ldrun.name: 淘金者
ldrun.original_desc:
The Bungeling Empire has stolen a huge cache of gold from its rightful owners, and your mission is to infiltrate its treasury and recapture it. This entails progressing through 150 screens of platforms, ladders and ropes.

The Empire has sent robotic guards down to protect the gold, and contact with any of these will cost you a life. Your method of escaping them is to press fire to dig a hole in their line of movement, thus causing them to fall in briefly, allowing you to move across the gap safely. Once all the gold has been collected, a ladder allowing you to move onto the next screen is added. Completing these screens often requires forward planning and precision.
ldrun.desc:
邦格林帝國從其合法所有者那裡偷走了大量黃金，你的任務是滲透其金庫並奪回它。這需要通過 150 個由平台、梯子和繩索組成的屏幕。

帝國已派出機器人守衛來保護黃金，與其中任何一個接觸都會讓你喪命。你逃離它們的方法是按下火力在它們的移動路線上挖一個洞，從而使它們短暫陷入，讓你安全地穿過間隙。收集完所有金幣後，就會添加一個梯子，讓您可以進入下一個屏幕。完成這些篩選通常需要前瞻性規劃和精確度。

dassault.name: 雷區
dassault.original_desc: The players control one of four soldiers, in his mission must grab machine guns or other projectile weapons, throw grenades and shoot their way through the terrorist arsenal, you could make uses of some war vehicles, while you save the hostages and reach to  terrorist lair and stop the leader and his evil plan of launch a missile of chemical arms  containing deadly spores, stop it before it's too late the world needs you soldier.
dassault.desc: 玩家控制四名士兵中的一名，在他的任務中必須拿起機槍或其他射彈武器，投擲手榴彈並射擊恐怖分子的軍火庫，你可以使用一些戰車，同時拯救人質並到達恐怖分子的巢穴並阻止領導人和他發射含有致命孢子的化學武器導彈的邪惡計劃，在為時已晚之前阻止它，世界需要你的士兵。

avspirit.name: 復仇之魂
avspirit.original_desc:
While walking out with his girlfriend the game's hero is ambushed by unknown enemies who snatch his girlfriend and shoot the hero dead. Now, as a wandering spirit with the ability to possess almost anybody he comes across, the hero is summoned by his girlfriend's father and given a mission to save her from the mysterious crime syndicate that holds her hostage. Only then can the hero rest in peace.

The player's character 'inhabits' a body with which to combat the game's enemies. When that body is killed, providing there is a living enemy nearby (other than that of a boss) the player can posses them and continue playing. Each time this is done, it costs the player some of their 'spirit energy'. Should the hero die when there are no enemies close by for the player to possess; the game is over.
avspirit.desc:
當遊戲的英雄與女友外出時，遭到未知敵人的伏擊，他們搶走了他的女友並射殺了英雄。現在，作為一個能夠附身幾乎所有他遇到的人的遊魂，英雄被女友的父親召喚，並被賦予了一項使命，將她從扣押她人質的神秘犯罪集團手中解救出來。只有這樣，英雄才能安息。

玩家的角色“居住”在一個身體裡，用來對抗遊戲中的敵人。當該屍體被殺死時，只要附近有一個活著的敵人（除了 Boss 之外），玩家就可以擁有它們並繼續玩。每次這樣做，都會消耗玩家一些“精神能量”。如果英雄在附近沒有敵人可供玩家控制的情況下死亡；遊戲結束了。

jungleh.name: 叢林狩獵
jungleh.original_desc:
Jungle Hunt is a jungle adventure game where players take on the role of a vine-swinging, pith-helmeted explorer. He's off to save the beautiful girl, who has been kidnapped by a pair of barbaric cannibals. Swing through vines, swing through crocodile-infested rivers, jump over boulders, and then dodge the cannibals!

Jungle Hunt was originally titles Jungle King, and the explorer was originally designed to look like Tarzan - he even started the game with the Tarzan scream!  The owners of the Tarzan trademark complained, leading Taito to reissue the game as Jungle Hunt. The only major change was the deletion of the scream and changing the Tarzan-like Jungle King into an explorer in a pith helmet. Even later, Taito would reissue it again as the pirate-themed Pirate Pete.
jungleh.desc:
《Jungle Hunt》是一款叢林冒險遊戲，玩家扮演一名揮舞藤蔓、戴著髓頭盔的探險家。他要去拯救被一對野蠻食人者綁架的美麗女孩。盪過藤蔓，盪過鱷魚出沒的河流，跳過巨石，然後躲避食人者！

叢林狩獵最初的標題是“叢林之王”，而探險家最初被設計成看起來像泰山——他甚至以泰山的尖叫開始遊戲！《泰山》商標的所有者提出投訴，導致 Taito 將游戲重新發行為《叢林狩獵》。唯一的重大變化是刪除了尖叫聲，並將泰山般的叢林王變成了戴著髓頭盔的探險家。甚至後來，Taito 又重新發行了以海盜為主題的《Pirate Pete》。

thndrbld.name: 雷霆之刃
thndrbld.original_desc:
Taking control of a heavily-armed battle chopper, the player must battle through a variety of both overhead and 'into-the-screen' 3-D stages.

Thunder Blade consists of four stages, which are as follows:
Stage 1: The game begins in a skyscraper-packed city. Enemies consist of rival choppers, jets, and ground-based tanks and gun emplacements. The level ends over the sea, with the player facing a huge and heavily-armed battleship. 
Stage 2: This stage begins with the player navigating a desert canyon, before switching to the into-the-screen view and taking the player through a number of stalactite-packed and densely populated caves. A huge ground-based tank awaits the player at the end of the stage.
Stage 3: This begins in a river canyon, before moving on to a rain-forest river network. As well the the usual line-up of enemies, heavily-armed boats are introduced. the end-of-level battle takes place in the skies as the player attempts to destroy a massive jet fighter.
Stage 4: The 4th and final stage begins with a repeat of the first stage's city level, only this time the action takes place at night. The second half of this stage takes the player deep into an industrial complex, eventually leading to an end-of-game showdown with a massive and heavily-armed gun emplacement.
thndrbld.desc:
玩家控制全副武裝的戰鬥直升機，必須通過各種頭頂和“進入屏幕”的 3D 關卡進行戰鬥。

雷霆之刃分為四個階段，分別如下：
第一階段：遊戲開始於一座摩天大樓林立的城市。敵人包括對手的直升機、噴氣式飛機、地面坦克和砲台。關卡結束於海上，玩家面對的是一艘巨大且全副武裝的戰艦。
第 2 階段：此階段從玩家在沙漠峽谷中航行開始，然後切換到屏幕視圖並帶領玩家穿過許多鐘乳石密布且人口稠密的洞穴。一個巨大的地面坦克在舞台的盡頭等待著玩家。
第三階段：從河流峽谷開始，然後進入雨林河網。除了通常的敵人陣容外，還引入了全副武裝的船隻。當玩家試圖摧毀一架大型噴氣式戰鬥機時，關卡結束的戰鬥發生在天空中。
第四階段：第四階段也是最後階段，以重複第一階段的城市關卡開始，只不過這次的行動發生在晚上。該階段的後半部分將帶領玩家深入工業綜合體，最終導致遊戲結束時與大規模、全副武裝的槍砲陣地的對決。

imgfight.name: 形像大戰
imgfight.original_desc:
Image Fight is a vertically scrolling shoot-em-up with an original premise. The game's first five stages are supposed to be a 'simulation' and serve as training to test the player's abilities. Player's will receive a penalty if their hit-ratio is too low.

Once players have proved themselves on the opening stages, they will progress to the game's last three stages, blasting off into space on a mission to destroy the alien vegetation surrounding the Moon's main computer. If the player fails in the mission, they must endure the dreaded 'Penalty Zone'. Features a high level of challenge, a wide variety of weapons and the ability to change speed.

If the player's ship is equipped with one or more red/blue extra guns, pushing both Action buttons simultaneously will sling the guns forward in a boomerang-like fashion. This is a powerful and destructive method and can be done an unlimited number of times.
imgfight.desc:
Image Fight 是一款具有原創前提的垂直滾動射擊遊戲。遊戲的前五個階段應該是“模擬”，作為測試玩家能力的訓練。如果命中率太低，玩家將受到懲罰。

一旦玩家在開始階段證明了自己，他們將進入遊戲的最後三個階段，發射到太空，執行摧毀月球主計算機周圍的外星植被的任務。如果玩家任務失敗，他們就必須忍受可怕的“禁區”。具有高水平的挑戰、多種多樣的武器和改變速度的能力。

如果玩家的飛船配備了一把或多把紅/藍額外的槍，同時按下兩個動作按鈕就會以類似迴旋鏢的方式向前拋射槍。這是一種強大且具有破壞性的方法，可以無限次地進行。

rallyx.name: 拉力賽X
rallyx.original_desc:
In Rally-X, the player drives a car around a maze picking up all of the yellow flags, of which there are ten, before the car's fuel runs out. The game-play has a similar feel to another Namco legend, "Pac-Man"; although in Rally-X, the mazes are much larger and, with each maze having only ten flags to collect, is more sparsely populated than Namco's pill-eating legend.

In-game opponents consist of red enemy cars that try to ram into and destroy the player's car, a problem compounded by the fact that enemy cars are faster than the player's. A smoke screen can be activated which trails behind the player's car and causes any pursuing enemies to crash. Each maze also has rock formations which, if crashed into, will result in the loss of a player car. A radar display to the right hand side of the playing area shows the positions of both the flags, and the enemy vehicles.
rallyx.desc:
在 Rally-X 中，玩家駕駛汽車繞迷宮行駛，在汽車燃料耗盡之前撿起所有黃旗（其中有十個）。遊戲玩法與南夢宮的另一個傳奇人物“吃豆人”有相似的感覺；儘管在 Rally-X 中，迷宮要大得多，而且每個迷宮只有 10 個旗幟可供收集，而且比 Namco 的吃藥丸傳奇還要稀疏。

遊戲中的對手由紅色敵方汽車組成，它們試圖撞上並摧毀玩家的汽車，由於敵方汽車比玩家的汽車更快，這一問題變得更加複雜。可以激活煙幕，它會尾隨玩家的汽車並導致任何追擊的敵人墜毀。每個迷宮也有岩層，如果撞上，將導致玩家汽車損失。比賽區域右側的雷達顯示屏顯示旗幟和敵方車輛的位置。

wofu.name: 命運的戰士
wofu.original_desc: Warriors of Fate is a side-scrolling beat 'em up produced by Capcom, first released as a coin-operated arcade game in 1992 and later ported to the Sega Saturn and Sony PlayStation. It is Capcom's third game based on the Tenchi wo Kurau manga, following Dynasty Wars and Destiny of an Emperor.
wofu.desc: 《命運戰士》是由 Capcom 製作的橫向捲軸清版遊戲，於 1992 年首次作為投幣街機遊戲發行，後來移植到 Sega Saturn 和 Sony PlayStation。這是繼《王朝戰爭》和《皇帝的命運》之後，Capcom 推出的第三款基於漫畫《天地之戰》的遊戲。

tekken2.name: 铁拳2
tekken2.original_desc:
Two years after winning the original 'King of the Iron Fist' tournament, Kazuya Mishima decides to hold a second tournament in an attempt to finish off his father, Heihachi Mishima, in this sequel to 1994 original.

The gameplay in Tekken 2 is identical to that of its predecessor, with one or two players fighting over a series of 3D-rendered backdrops. As before, the fighting system utilises four attack buttons: left punch, right punch, left kick and right kick. Certain button combinations will initiate both standard and special grab and throwing moves.
tekken2.desc:
在贏得原版“鐵拳之王”錦標賽兩年後，三島和也決定舉辦第二場錦標賽，試圖在這部 1994 年原版的續集中終結他的父親三島平八。

《鐵拳 2》的遊戲玩法與其前作相同，一兩個玩家在一系列 3D 渲染的背景下進行戰鬥。和以前一樣，戰鬥系統使用四個攻擊按鈕：左拳、右拳、左踢和右踢。某些按鈕組合將啟動標準和特殊的抓取和投擲動作。

mk.original_desc:
Mortal Kombat, first in the Mortal Kombat series, is a 1-on-1 fighting game featuring a cast of seven different characters. Mortal Kombat took ideas from Capcom's seminal Street Fighter II, such as the game's special moves and projectiles. It also introduced a cast of photo-realistic digitized fighters for players to fight either as or against.  
 
Mortal Kombat characters list: 
JOHNNY CAGE 
KANO 
RAIDEN 
LIU KANG 
SCORPION 
SUB-ZERO 
SONYA BLADE 
 
Battles are fought over the best of three rounds. At the end of a battle, a voice instructs the winner to 'Finish Him/Her!' and players have only a couple of seconds to try and execute their character's 'fatality', which sees the winner killing the loser in a spectacular and grisly fashion.

bzone.name: 戰區
bzone.original_desc:
Battlezone is a classic one-player first person 3-D wire frame shoot-em-up in which the player controls a tank patrolling a dangerous war zone. Set in a valley surrounded by mountains, the aim is to destroy as many enemy tanks as possible, while avoiding return fire and destroying or avoiding the homing missiles that occasionally appear.

Enemy tanks come in two varieties; standard slow-moving tanks and fast-moving 'Super Tanks'. A single hit taken from either an enemy tank or homing missile will result in the loss of a player tank. A flying saucer also occasionally appears but does not attack the player and can be either ignored or destroyed for bonus points.
bzone.desc:
Battlezone 是一款經典的單人第一人稱 3D 線框射擊遊戲，玩家控制一輛坦克在危險的戰區巡邏。遊戲位於群山環抱的山谷中，目標是盡可能多地摧毀敵方坦克，同時避免還擊，並摧毀或避開偶爾出現的尋的導彈。

敵方坦克有兩種類型：標準緩慢移動的坦克和快速移動的“超級坦克”。敵方坦克或尋的導彈的單次命中將導致玩家坦克損失。飛碟偶爾也會出現，但不會攻擊玩家，可以被忽略或摧毀以獲得獎勵積分。

shadfrce.name: 暗影之力
shadfrce.original_desc:
Shadow Force is a side-scrolling platform beat-em-up for one or two players, who choose to play as one of four Ninjas and must use all the means at their disposal to free the world from the grip of the evil Dr. Wong and his terrifying 'Theaser' organization.

Shadow Force has 6 buttons: 2 for punches (low and high) 2 for kicks (low and high) 1 for jumping and 1 for possessing an enemy. Additional attack moves can be utilised by moving the joystick up or down and pressing punch and kick buttons. It's also possible to combine punch and kick attacks to obtain different combos and while the enemies can do the same, the number and variation of their attacks is generally lower than those available to the players.

In addition to being able to possess nearby enemies, Shadow Force also features something else new to the side-scrolling beat-em-up genre; at the end of each stage players take part in a bonus round consisting of a one-on-one fight. 

Players can choose to start on any one of the first three stages and the game features 14 different possible endings.
shadfrce.desc:
《Shadow Force》是一款橫向捲軸平台格鬥遊戲，適合一到兩名玩家，他們選擇扮演四名忍者之一，必須使用一切可用手段將世界從邪惡的黃博士和他可怕的“Theaser”組織的控制中解放出來。

暗影之力有 6 個按鈕：2 個用於出拳（低和高）、2 個用於踢（低和高）、1 個用於跳躍、1 個用於控制敵人。通過向上或向下移動操縱桿並按下拳擊和踢腿按鈕可以使用額外的攻擊動作。還可以結合拳打和腳踢攻擊來獲得不同的連擊，雖然敵人也可以這樣做，但他們的攻擊數量和變化通常低於玩家可用的攻擊數量和變化。

除了能夠控製附近的敵人之外，《Shadow Force》還具有橫向捲軸格鬥遊戲類型中的其他新功能；在每個階段結束時，玩家都會參加由一對一戰鬥組成的獎勵回合。

玩家可以選擇從前三個階段中的任何一個開始，遊戲有 14 種不同的可能結局。

lkage.name: 影傳奇
lkage.original_desc:
As a Ninja, defeat the evils from Devil's World and save the Princess.

At the end of the Edo Period (late 19th century) in Japan, a Corps formed by the evils, which had come back to life from the Devil's World, was terrifying people all over the country. One day the princess 'Kiri', a daughter of the lord, was kidnapped by the Corps. In order to save her from them, a number of militia were sent to the Corps' Headquarters, but none of them ever returned. Then one young man headed for the Corps' Headquarters to save the princess. His name 'Kage', a ninja from Iga Village.
lkage.desc:
作為忍者，擊敗惡魔世界的邪惡並拯救公主。

日本江戶時代末期（19世紀末），一支從魔界復活的邪惡勢力所組成的軍團，令全國人民聞風喪膽。有一天，領主的女兒公主“基里”被軍團綁架了。為了將她從他們手中救出來，一些民兵被派往軍團總部，但他們再也沒有回來。隨後一名青年前往軍團總部營救公主。他的名字叫“影”，是伊賀村的忍者。

xmen2p.name: X戰警
xmen2p.original_desc:
X-Men is a side-scrolling beat-em-up for up to four players. The X-Men's mission is to find and rescue Professor X, who has been captured by evil mutants and is now being held prisoner by Magneto.

Each X-Man character has an 'Attack', 'Jump' and 'Mutant Power' button. The mutant power attack is a powerful special move unique to each X-Man. While it inflicts a lot of damage on the enemies, the trade-off is that each usage removes 3 bars from the players health meter (a full meter has 10 bars). Each level ends with a face-off against a powerful mutant boss character.

The game has six stages, with the final one set on 'Asteroid M', Magneto's base. The defeated mutant bosses from the previous levels each make an appearance (albeit in a less powerful form) before the final encounter with Magneto himself.

Players can chose from 6 X-Men characters, they are:
Cyclops 
Colossus 
Wolverine 
Storm 
Nightcrawler 
Dazzler
xmen2p.desc:
X 戰警是一款橫向捲軸格鬥遊戲，最多可容納 4 名玩家。X戰警的任務是尋找並營救被邪惡變種人俘虜並被萬磁王囚禁的X教授。

每個 X 戰警角色都有一個“攻擊”、“跳躍”和“突變力量”按鈕。突變體強力攻擊是每個 X 戰警獨有的強大必殺技。雖然它會對敵人造成大量傷害，但代價是每次使用都會使玩家的生命值減少 3 條（一整條生命值有 10 條）。每個關卡都以與強大的突變頭目角色的對峙結束。

遊戲有六個階段，最後一個階段設置在萬磁王的基地“小行星 M”上。在與萬磁王本人的最終相遇之前，之前關卡中被擊敗的變種人 Boss 都會出現（儘管以不太強大的形式）。

玩家可以從 6 個 X 戰警角色中進行選擇，他們是：
獨眼巨人
巨像
金剛狼
風暴
夜行者
炫目者

paperboy.name: 帕普沃伊
paperboy.original_desc:
Paperboy © 1984 Atari Games.

Paperboy is a one or two-player game in which the objective is to deliver Newspapers to the Paperboy's customers from Monday through to Sunday. 

Each game begins with ten customers and ten non-customers. Paperboy's customers live in the brightly coloured houses, while non-customers live in dark coloured houses. To deliver to a customer, the player must throw a paper either into the customer's mailbox, or onto their front porch. Failure to deliver a paper to a customer results in the loss of that customer for the next day. Any damage done to a customer's property also results in the loss of that customer. Losing all ten of Paperboy's customers will get him fired and the game is over. However, on any day in which all customers have their papers successfully delivered, one of the non-customers will re-subscribe.

Non-customers' houses and yards are loaded with targets at which to throw your extra papers (windows, lamps, statues, etc.). Hitting these targets earns points for the "Breakage Bonus", which is displayed at the top center of the screen. The total Breakage Bonus is awarded to the player at the end of each day (or at the end of the game-whichever comes first). 

If Paperboy loses a customer, that customer's house will be dark coloured the next day. As a non-subscriber, this house now presents more targets at which to throw newspapers for building up the Breakage Bonus. At the start of each day, a map of Paperboy's route is displayed to indicate subscriber and non-subscriber houses. This helps to remind players of what customers they may have lost on the previous day and the location of remaining customers. 

Paperboy can carry a maximum of ten papers at a time, but can restock his supply by riding over paper bundles placed here and there on his route. A paper supply indicator is displayed underneath the player's score. 

While making his deliveries, Paperboy must avoid collisions with all stationary objects and other characters moving about the neighborhood. To avoid collisions, Paperboy can ride his bike anywhere - on the sidewalk, in the street, or into front yards. A collision with anything results in the loss of a life. 

In addition to the obstacles, non-subscribers are hostile towards Paperboy and will attack him and try to knock him down. If Paperboy damages a subscriber's property, that character may also attack. So the more customers that are lost, the more hostile the neighborhood becomes toward Paperboy. 

At the end of each delivery day, players have a chance to sharpen their skills by guiding Paperboy through the Paperboy Training Grounds. This obstacle course is filled with various targets at which to throw newspaper, as well as ramp jumps to be negotiated. This is a bonus round and no lives are lost for failing to reach the finish line.
paperboy.desc:
報童© 1984 年雅達利遊戲。

Paperboy 是一款單人或兩人遊戲，目標是從周一到週日向 Paperboy 的顧客提供報紙。

每場遊戲從十名顧客和十名非顧客開始。Paperboy 的顧客住在顏色鮮豔的房子裡，而非顧客住在深色的房子裡。為了交付給顧客，玩家必須將一張紙扔進顧客的郵箱或他們的前廊。未能向客戶交付論文會導致第二天失去該客戶。對客戶財產造成的任何損害也會導致該客戶的損失。失去所有十個報童的顧客將使他被解僱，遊戲就結束了。然而，在所有客戶的論文均成功交付的任何一天，其中一位非客戶將重新訂閱。

非客戶的房屋和院子里布滿了可以扔額外紙張的目標（窗戶、燈、雕像等）。達到這些目標即可獲得“破壞獎金”積分，該積分顯示在屏幕頂部中央。總破損獎金將在每天結束時（或遊戲結束時 - 以先到者為準）獎勵給玩家。

如果 Paperboy 失去了一位顧客，該顧客的房子第二天就會變成深色。作為非訂閱者，這所房子現在提出了更多的目標來投擲報紙以積累破損獎金。每天開始時，都會顯示 Paperboy 的路線地圖，以指示訂閱者和非訂閱者的房屋。這有助於提醒玩家前一天可能失去了哪些客戶以及剩餘客戶的位置。

報童一次最多可以攜帶十張紙，但可以通過騎在路線上隨處可見的紙捆來補充供應。紙張供應指示器顯示在玩家得分下方。

在送貨時，報童必須避免與所有靜止物體和在附近移動的其他角色發生碰撞。為了避免碰撞，Paperboy 可以在任何地方騎自行車 - 在人行道上、街道上或前院。與任何物體發生碰撞都會導致生命損失。

除了障礙之外，非訂閱者還對報童充滿敵意，會攻擊他並試圖擊倒他。如果報童損壞了訂閱者的財產，該角色也可能會攻擊。因此，失去的顧客越多，鄰居們對報童的敵意就越大。

在每個送貨日結束時，玩家都有機會通過指導報童通過報童訓練場來提高自己的技能。這個障礙訓練場充滿了各種可以扔報紙的目標，以及需要談判的坡道跳躍。這是獎金回合，不會因未能到達終點線而喪生。

robocp2u.name: 機械戰警2
robocp2u.original_desc: An arcade-only sequel to the 1988 original, placing less of an emphasis on platform action than the face game and concentrating almost exclusively on the shooting aspect.
robocp2u.desc: 這是 1988 年原作的街機續作，與臉部遊戲相比，更注重平台動作，幾乎完全專注於射擊方面。

polepos2.name: 杆位 II
polepos2.original_desc:
Pole Position II is a 1-player game using a color raster-scan video display. Game action takes place at four different raceways - the Fuji Speedway in Japan, the Test Track (an oval track like Indy), the Seaside Speedway (with the Long Beach Pike in the background), and the Suzuka Speedway in Japan. The unique and picturesque scenery around each raceway adds exciting realism to each race! 

The player drives a Formula-1 race car on each track. The first objective of the game is to finish the qualifying lap as quickly as possible. If the player beats the time, he or she qualifies for the race. If not, he or she drives the remainder of his time along the qualifying course.
polepos2.desc:
Pole Position II 是一款使用彩色光柵掃描視頻顯示器的單人遊戲。遊戲發生在四個不同的賽道上——日本的富士賽道、測試賽道（像印地賽道一樣的橢圓形賽道）、海濱賽道（背景是長灘派克）和日本的鈴鹿賽道。每條賽道周圍獨特而風景如畫的風景為每場比賽增添了令人興奮的真實感！

玩家在每條賽道上駕駛一級方程式賽車。比賽的首要目標是盡快完成排位賽圈。如果玩家擊敗了時間，他或她就有資格參加比賽。如果沒有，他或她將在剩餘時間中沿著排位賽路線行駛。

gunsmoku.name: 槍
gunsmoku.original_desc:
Gun.Smoke is a vertically-scrolling shoot-em-up set in the Wild West, in which the player takes the role of a Billy; a young Sheriff charged with hunting down and killing a number of infamous 'Wanted' outlaws.

Each level is packed with gun-toting bandits and the Sheriff must shoot his way through the stage, before finally taking on the wanted outlaw 'boss' character at the end. Each outlaw wields a special weapon unique to them, such as a Winchester rifle, knives, darts or boomerangs.

Shooting the barrels that litter the levels reveals power-ups such as boots (for extra speed), rifles (for increased range) and bullets (for rapid fire). The game's 3 directional fire buttons (for firing left, right or ahead) can be combined (pressed Simultaneously) to create a total of 8 different firing directions.
gunsmoku.desc:
Gun.Smoke 是一款以狂野西部為背景的垂直捲軸射擊遊戲，玩家在其中扮演比利的角色；一位年輕的警長被指控追捕並殺害一些臭名昭著的“通緝犯”。

每個關卡都擠滿了持槍強盜，治安官必須在舞台上開槍殺出一條血路，最後才能在最後扮演被通緝的歹徒“老大”角色。每個亡命之徒都揮舞著他們獨有的特殊武器，例如溫徹斯特步槍、刀具、飛鏢或迴旋鏢。

射擊關卡中散落的槍管會顯示出能量道具，例如靴子（用於額外速度）、步槍（用於增加射程）和子彈（用於快速射擊）。遊戲的 3 個方向射擊按鈕（用於向左、向右或向前射擊）可以組合（同時按下）以創建總共 8 個不同的射擊方向。

mooua.original_name: Wild West C.O.W.-Boys of Moo Mesa
mooua.name: 狂野西部 C.O.W.-Boys of Moo Mesa
mooua.original_desc:
Wild West C.O.W. Boys of Moo Mesa is a horizontally-scrolling platform run 'n' gun game for up to four players. The game is set in America's Wild West and is based on the cartoon series of the same name. 

Players take on the roles of four recently mutated cows - now turned lawmen; the Cowlorado Kid, the Dakota Dude, Marshall Moo Montana and the shotgun-toting Buffalo Bull. The lawmen must shoot their way through enemy-packed stages to take down wanted criminals.

Controls consist of a jump and an attack button and pressing both buttons simultaneously will cause the player character to perform a stampede attack, do a spinning jump, or use any equipped item like dynamite sticks and tomahawk blades. 

Numerous variety of power-up items can be found by shooting flying chickens, these include a rapid-fire Machine Gun and a Power-Up for wider bullets. Players have a three-unit life gauge that allows them to take three hits before losing a life. 

The game consists of eight stages, each with a boss fight at the end, and after the first stage, players can choose in which order they want to tackle the following stages.
mooua.desc:
狂野西部 C.O.W. Boys of Moo Mesa 是一款水平滾動平台跑酷遊戲，最多可容納 4 名玩家。該遊戲以美國狂野西部為背景，改編自同名卡通系列。

玩家扮演四頭最近變異的牛——現在變成了執法者；考洛拉多小子（Cowlorado Kid）、達科他花花公子（Dakota Dude）、馬歇爾·穆·蒙大拿（Marshall Moo Montana）和攜帶獵槍的水牛公牛（Buffalo Bull）。執法人員必須在敵人密布的關卡中殺出一條血路，抓獲通緝犯。

控件由跳躍和攻擊按鈕組成，同時按下兩個按鈕將導致玩家角色執行踩踏攻擊、旋轉跳躍或使用任何裝備的物品，例如炸藥棒和戰斧刀片。

通過射擊飛雞可以找到多種強化物品，其中包括速射機槍和更寬子彈的強化物品。玩家有一個三單位的生命計量表，允許他們在失去生命之前受到三次打擊。

遊戲由八個階段組成，每個階段最後都會有一場Boss戰，在第一個階段之後，玩家可以選擇他們想要處理以下階段的順序。

phoenix.name: 鳳凰
phoenix.original_desc:
Phoenix is a classic vertical shoot-em-up in the mould of Taito's "Space Invaders" and Namco's "Galaxian", but takes the concept further with the introduction of progressive stages of play (instead of simply repeating a single playfield over and over with an increasing difficulty level).

According to Centuri's Joel Hochberg, the game was licensed from "a smaller Japanese developer." Amstar Electronics licensed the game to Centuri for manufacture in the United States. Taito released the game in Japan.
phoenix.desc:
《Phoenix》是一款經典的垂直射擊遊戲，模仿 Taito 的《Space Invaders》和 Namco 的《Galaxian》，但通過引入漸進的遊戲階段（而不是簡單地一遍又一遍地重複單一遊戲場地並增加難度）進一步深化了這一概念。

據 Centuri 的 Joel Hochberg 稱，該遊戲是從“一家規模較小的日本開發商”獲得許可的。Amstar Electronics 將該遊戲授權給 Centuri 在美國製造。Taito 在日本發行了該遊戲。

dkong3.name: 大金剛3
dkong3.original_desc: Stanley is a bugman. Donkey Kong has taken refuge in his greenhouse and it is now up to Stanley to stop the ape from stirring up any more insects that will soon destroy his flowers. Stanley saves the flowers by spraying bug spray on Donkey Kong.
dkong3.desc: 斯坦利是個臭蟲。大金剛已經躲進了他的溫室裡，現在斯坦利得阻止這只猩猩激起更多的昆蟲，這些昆蟲很快就會毀掉他的花朵。斯坦利向大金剛噴灑殺蟲劑，拯救了花朵。

tempest.name: 暴風雨
tempest.original_desc: The objective of Tempest is to survive as long as possible and score as many points as possible by clearing the screen of enemies that have landed on the playing field. The player's ship can rapid-fire shots down the tube, destroying any enemies within the same segment, and is also equipped with a Superzapper, which destroys all enemies currently on the playfield once per level. (A second use of the Superzapper in a level destroys one random enemy.)
tempest.desc: 《暴風雨》的目標是通過清除屏幕上降落在比賽場地上的敵人來盡可能長時間地生存並獲得盡可能多的分數。玩家的飛船可以沿著管子快速射擊，摧毀同一段內的任何敵人，並且還配備了超級射擊器，每關一次，它會摧毀當前在遊戲場上的所有敵人。（在關卡中第二次使用 Superzapper 會隨機消滅一名敵人。）

altbeast.name: 獸化獸
altbeast.original_desc: You are a hero raised from the dead by the god Zeus to rescue his daughter Athena. With scenery inspired by Ancient Greece, you have to fight hordes of undead and demons, with a boss at the end of each level until you meet the god Neff, who holds the girl captive. The Altered Beast title refers to your shapeshifting abilities. In this platformer, you can collect spirit balls by defeating two-headed wolves, allowing you to mutate into different beasts such as a werewolf, a dragon, a tiger, a bear and others depending on the version. Each form, tied to a level, comes with special abilities such as flight and powerful attacks, easily superseding the basic set of punches and kicks in your human form.
altbeast.desc: 你是一位英雄，被宙斯從死裡復活，拯救他的女兒雅典娜。場景靈感源自古希臘，你必須與成群的不死族和惡魔戰鬥，每個關卡的最後都有一個頭目，直到你遇到囚禁女孩的內夫神。獸王稱號指的是你的變形能力。在這個平台遊戲中，你可以通過擊敗雙頭狼來收集靈球，讓你根據版本變異成不同的野獸，如狼人、龍、虎、熊等。每種形態都與等級相關，都具有特殊能力，例如飛行和強大的攻擊，可以輕鬆取代人類形態中的基本拳打腳踢。

horizon.name: 地平線
horizon.original_desc:
A horizontally scrolling shooter, Horizon is the sequel to Moon Patrol. Both were developed by Irem; Moon Patrol was licensed to Williams.  

Players take control of hover vehicle armed with a turret and a cannon, rolling over the terrain and alternating their position and perspective on three different lanes to destroy enemies and dodge attacks while avoiding obstacles and picking up fuel and other items.
horizon.desc:
《地平線》是一款水平捲軸射擊遊戲，是《月球巡邏隊》的續作。兩者均由 Irem 開發；月球巡邏隊被授權給威廉姆斯。

玩家控製配備砲塔和大砲的懸停車輛，在地形上滾動並在三個不同的車道上交替位置和視角，以摧毀敵人並躲避攻擊，同時避開障礙物並拾取燃料和其他物品。

mmatrix.name: 火星矩陣：超實景射擊
mmatrix.original_desc: A prediction is that before human civilization, there was once an advanced civilization on Mars. A sorceress destroyed the civilization and everything that was remembered of it, except a chip called "INFINITY". In 2100, millions of people were starving due to massive food shortages and has caused civil wars around the world. Centuries later, however, the world government had sent colonists to Mars which began to solve these problems. At a nearby farm, the Infinity chip was discovered and it revealed all the technology of the advanced civilization. In 2309, a Declaration of Independence has been sent to Earth. Large armies have been amassed on Mars, and a gigantic armada was waiting for any attack from Earth. The Earth government sends out a fleet of battleships followed by a special air raid unit called ACID; ACID is equipped with a new fighter ship known as the Mosquito. Their mission is to enter Mars, stop the rebel violence, locate and destroy the rebel leader, whoever... or whatever it may be...
mmatrix.desc: 一個預測是，在人類文明出現之前，火星上曾經存在過先進的文明。一位女術士摧毀了文明以及記憶中的一切，除了一塊名為“INFINITY”的芯片。2100年，數百萬人因嚴重糧食短缺而挨餓，並引發了世界各地的內戰。然而幾個世紀後，世界政府將殖民者送往火星，開始解決這些問題。在附近的一個農場，發現了無限芯片，它揭示了先進文明的所有技術。2309年，一份獨立宣言被發送到地球。火星上已經集結了大軍，一支龐大的艦隊正等待著來自地球的攻擊。地球政府派遣了一支戰列艦艦隊，隨後派遣了一支名為 ACID 的特殊空襲部隊； ACID 配備了一艘名為“蚊子”的新型戰鬥機。他們的任務是進入火星，制止叛亂分子的暴力行為，找到並摧毀叛亂領導人，無論他是誰……或無論是什麼……

galaxian.name: 在銀河系
galaxian.original_desc: Galaxian is a legendary single-screen shoot-em-up that took everything that made Taito's ground-breaking "Space Invaders" so good, and improved upon it on every level. Each screen starts with a wave of multi-colored aliens moving left and right at the top of the screen; the aliens quickly break ranks and start dive-bombing the Galaxip (player's ship) - either in single units or in groups of 3 - dropping multiple missiles as they descend. All of the aliens need to be destroyed before the player can progress to the next wave.
galaxian.desc: Galaxian 是一款傳奇的單屏射擊遊戲，它繼承了 Taito 開創性的《太空侵略者》的所有優點，並在各個層面上進行了改進。每個屏幕都以一波多色外星人在屏幕頂部左右移動開始；外星人很快就打破了隊列，開始俯衝轟炸 Galaxip（玩家的飛船）——無論是單個單位還是 3 人一組——在下降時投下多枚導彈。在玩家進入下一波之前，需要消滅所有外星人。

spf2t.name: 超級益智鬥士 II 渦輪增壓
spf2t.original_desc: Burst right into the feverish puzzle action that combines irresistible, addictive fun with famous Capcom characters. Beat your opponent to the punch by stacking block after block in strategic patterns and color combinations. Be the first to fill the opponent's screen with blocks and K.O. you win! But get ready for more, because you can't play just once.
spf2t.desc: 立即投入到狂熱的解謎動作中，將不可抗拒的、令人上癮的樂趣與著名的 Capcom 角色融為一體。通過以戰略圖案和顏色組合堆疊一個又一個的方塊，擊敗你的對手。成為第一個用方塊填滿對手屏幕並擊倒對手的人。你贏了！但要做好更多的準備，因為你不能只玩一次。

wboyu.name: 神奇男孩
wboyu.original_desc: Just when things were going great with Tom-Tom and his girlfriend Tanya, some thug of a woodland king had to kidnap her and hide her away, and Tom-Tom doesn't have a clue where. That's why he has to explore deep dark forests, cross endless oceans, climb treacherous slopes, survive endless volcanoes, and even walk through clouds. But Tom-Tom will never be totally alone. You see, when he goes through the exotic locations, he has to come face to face with its inhabitants, like bees, spiders, snakes, coal-kids, frogs, bats, snails, coyotes, and octopuses, to name a few. The hatchet is Tom-Tom's only line of defense against these menaces.
wboyu.desc: 就在湯姆湯姆和他的女朋友坦尼婭相處得很好時，森林之王的某個暴徒不得不綁架她並將她藏起來，而湯姆湯姆不知道她藏在哪裡。這就是為什麼他必須探索幽深的黑暗森林，穿越無盡的海洋，攀登危險的斜坡，在無盡的火山中生存，甚至穿越雲層。但湯姆湯姆永遠不會完全孤獨。你看，當他穿越異國他鄉時，他必須與那裡的居民面對面，比如蜜蜂、蜘蛛、蛇、煤小孩、青蛙、蝙蝠、蝸牛、郊狼和章魚等等。斧頭是湯姆湯姆抵禦這些威脅的唯一防線。

nbajam.name: NBA 果醬大賽
nbajam.original_desc: Two-on-two basketball with digitized images of real NBA players, monster dunks and no referee - it's a blowout!
nbajam.desc: 二對二的籃球比賽，有真實 NBA 球員的數字化圖像、怪物扣籃，而且沒有裁判 - 這是一場井噴！

heatbrlu.name: 加熱桶
heatbrlu.original_desc: A cartoon style shoot-em'up featuring four wacky western characters: Howdy Pardner, a tough rootin 'tooting' sheriff with a big gun, Chi Chi Gringo, a boomerang toting bearded Mexican, Little Plum, a stereotype Indian brave and Billy Six Guns, a willy quick-on-the-draw roving Clint Eastwood type chap. These four hombres have pledged to rid Dodgem City of outlaws, ne'er-do-wells and, erm, ghosts. Each character has their chosen weapon which may be powered up by collecting the right item until the stage is set for a feast of doom and death.
heatbrlu.desc: 一款卡通風格的射擊遊戲，由四個古怪的西部角色組成：霍迪·帕德納（Howdy Pardner），一個拿著大槍的強硬“嘟嘟”警長；Chi Chi Gringo，一個帶著大鬍子的墨西哥人，一個迴旋鏢；Little Plum，一個典型的印第安勇士；比利六槍（Billy Six Guns），一個意志堅定的克林特·伊斯特伍德（Clint Eastwood）式的流浪小伙子。這四個人發誓要消滅多奇姆市的亡命之徒、無賴和鬼魂。每個角色都有自己選擇的武器，可以通過收集正確的物品來增強武器的威力，直到末日和死亡盛宴的舞台搭建完畢。

mappy.name: 馬皮
mappy.original_desc:
You control Mappy a police-mouse whose job is to collect valuables (consumer electronics)from a cat's house. You are being pursued by a gang of five pink cats. Doors are your only defense against the cats. You get from floor to floor by jumping on one of the trampolines.
Points are earned by recovering stolen goods. Other ways of earning points are bouncing on a trampoline, putting cats in the microwave, striking a cat with a door, striking cats with a bell, retrieving a treasures from the Boss cat Goro or dropping cats through a hole in the floor.
mappy.desc:
你控制著一隻警鼠Mappy，它的工作是從貓的家裡收集貴重物品（消費電子產品）。你正被五隻粉紅色的貓追趕。門是抵御貓的唯一防御手段。您可以通過在其中一張蹦床上跳躍來從一層到另一層。
通過追回被盜物品來賺取積分。其他賺取積分的方式包括在蹦床上彈跳、將貓放入微波爐、用門擊打貓、用鈴鐺擊打貓、從 Boss 貓 Goro 處取回寶藏或將貓扔進地板上的洞中。

cclimber.name: 瘋狂登山者
cclimber.original_desc: Crazy Climber is a 2-D, strategy style game. The game is strategic in the fact that you must plan your moves as you climb up the building and anticipate the hazards that await you. You start out the game at the bottom of a building to be scaled. As you climb up the building, you will be assailed by bald people throwing flowerpots, signs with loose electrical wires, very large apes, falling signs, trash and barbells, and a bird that likes to drop bad things on your character. Your goal is to make it to the top of the building and catch the helicopter, which will transport you to the next building to be scaled. Of course, you will be rewarded for quickly making it up the building by getting a bonus (that is as long as you can catch the helicopter). The things one does for publicity.
